heading: Come December, AI cameras to deter traffic violations in Goa’s 70 accident-prone zones

Here, AI cameras will be installed by December to monitor vehicular traffic and detect violations by motorists to strengthen the implementation of ITMS (Intelligent Traffic Management Systems). heading: Traffic cops identify 43 accident-prone spots in Bhopal, Karond Square most unsafe

While Karond Square tops the list as the most accident-prone spot with 45 s, the stretch of road in front of ISBT bus stand has been identified as the second most accident-prone spot with 29 accidents. Bhanpur Bypass in Chhola area has been identified as third with 26 s followed by Lalghati Square in Koh-e-Fiza with 25 s. A spot near Chetak Bridge in Govindpura and Gyarah Meel in front of Hanuman Temple in Misrod stands at fourth place with 23 s each.

sub-heading: The district transport department in Chhapra, India, on Wednesday honored five people who had acted as good Samaritans during Road accidents. Among the people honored were residents of Beldari village under Doudpur police station, Ashok Kumar Sah from Sajjanpur under Dariapur police station, Manoj Kumar Singh from Bahoran Singh Ka Tola Manjhi under Manjhi police station, and Ajmatullah Khan from Kopa village. The department has recommended these names to the respective police stations, and the five individuals were presented with a bouquet and a shawl by the district magistrate and the superintendent of police. The department has also stated that during this week, eye checkup camps will be organized for commercial drivers and their health will be examined to minimize s.

heading: Cops & auto drivers will be trained to help crash victims
sub-heading: The Ghaziabad health department has decided to train police personnel and auto and erickshaw drivers to give basic first aid to Road accident victims and rush them to hospital. A proposal to this effect has been sent to senior police officers for a review. Officials said during the training health department teams will inform them about symptoms of head injuries and the right way to pick up injured people among other things. Once the exercise gets under way in Ghaziabad, the chief medical officer will provide first aid kits at police outposts. "In many cases the victims are unable to reach the hospital on time if first aid is made available to them at the earliest it can save many lives," said Dr. R.K. Gupta, district surveillance officer. "We are planning to conduct training sessions for traffic constables and subinspectors as well as auto and erickshaw drivers who spend the majority of their time on the roads and often witness accidents if they are sensitised with the help of basic first aid knowledge they can help in saving lives and rush people to hospital in less time." According to the health officials, the training will focus on 16 black spots of the city where accidents often occur. "These places have already been identified by the police and our emergency

heading: Rs 62 lakh payout awarded to businessman’s kin killed in crash in Bhopal
sub-heading: A sessions court here awarded a compensation of Rs 62 lakh to the kin of a businessman, who was killed in a Road accident near 11 Mile on Misrod road. The court further ordered the owner and driver of the dumper which hit the motorbike of the deceased and the insurance company to pay an interest at the rate of 7% to the family of deceased from day of incident.

sub-heading: Five passengers were killed and over 17 others sustained injuries when a bus carrying a wedding party, which was hit by a speeding dumper, overturned and fell into a ditch, near Gopalpura of Jalaun district late on Saturday.

heading: Bihar second in accident deaths due to fog, mist
sub-heading: Bihar registered 1,800 deaths, the second highest in the country, due to foggy and misty weather conditions in 2021, as per the latest report on 'Road accidents in India 2021' released by the ministry of road transport and highways. Uttar Pradesh was on top with 3,782 fatalities due to similar reasons.

heading: Teacher dies in Silchar accident
sub-heading: A 34-year-old schoolteacher was killed in a Road accident on the Silchar-Kalinganagar road in Topkhana on the outskirts of Silchar town on Saturday.

heading: Ichalkaranji district judge succumbs to accident injury after three weeks of struggle in hospital
sub-heading: The judge breathed his last at 8am on Friday, a day after his 55th birthday, and is survived by his parents, wife and two daughters. The Ambatkar family hails from Manchar near Pune.

heading: 'Prompt treatment of brain injury can save many lives'
sub-heading: Neurosurgery department of the Indira Gandhi Institute of Medical Sciences (IGIMS) organised an awareness programme on brain and spinal injuries and their treatments, for patients and their attendants visiting the out patients departments (OPDs).

heading: Nine killed, several injured in accident on Ahmedabad-Mumbai highway in Navsari
sub-heading: The incident took place on the Ahmedabad-Mumbai highway in Navsari after a collision between bus and car

heading: 4 killed, 3 sustain injuries in separate accidents in Mathura & Etah
sub-heading: In two separate Road accidents, as many as four people were killed and three sustained injuries.

heading: 2 bikers killed in Sonitpur
sub-heading: Two bikers were killed after being hit by a speeding truck at Bihaguri in Assam’s Sonitpur district on Monday night. Police said the youths were rushed to a nearby hospital for medical assistance. However, the doctors declared them dead. Identification of the deceased was yet to be done.

heading: Ten killed in three accidents in Madhya Pradesh
sub-heading: Ten people were killed in different Road accidents in the state on Wednesday. Three persons were killed and several others injured when a bus they were travelling in overturned on the National Highway over bridge in Umaria. The passengers were on their way to attend chief minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan's programme a few kms away.

heading: 1,242 people died in Yamuna expressway accidents since 2012
sub-heading: At least 7,256 accidents have been reported on the 165.5km-long stretch of the six-lane Yamuna expressway resulting in 1,242 deaths and 10,520 injuries over the past 12 years (January 2012 to March 2023), revealed data provided by the Yamuna Expressway Industrial Development Authority (YEIDA), a UP government undertaking, in response to a recent RTI query.

heading: Man loses both legs in car crash, on road to recovery after rare surgery in Ahmedabad
sub-heading: Dhruv Ranpariya's life took a drastic turn when he got into a major Road accident in February. To avoid a collision with an animal on the road near Muthiya toll plaza on SP Ring Road, he swerved his car, hitting the divider. The impact was so severe that his car flipped over, and the floor tore, trapping and mangling both his legs. The bones and muscles just above the ankles pulled apart, causing his legs to detach.

heading: Two dead in lorry-car collision in Sircilla dist
sub-heading: Two people died after a lorry hit their car. The incident happened in Mudapalli. The two people who died were travelling to Vemulawada.

heading: Zero fatality week: Odisha records 70 accident deaths
sub-heading: The state government's maiden observance of zero fatality week from April 1 to 7 to curb deaths due to Road accidents witnessed a very high fatality rate compared to the previous week (March 24 to 31).

heading: 26-year-old injured in Dubai accident dies in Hyderabad hospital
sub-heading: A 26-year-old food delivery executive, who had suffered severe injuries in a Road accident in Dubai (the UAE) in February, succumbed while undergoing treatment at a hospital in the city on Sunday night.

heading: Four injured in accident near Marina beach in Chennai
sub-heading: Tamil Nadu minister for health and family welfare Ma Subramanian came to the rescue of four people who met with a Road accident near Marina beach late Saturday night. The minister took them to the hospital in his own vehicle.

heading: Jammu: 3 of a family killed, 20 injured in two separate accidents
sub-heading: Three members of a family, including a minor, were killed while 20 others were injured in two separate Road accidents in Jammu district in the last 24 hours.

heading: Two kids die, six people hurt in three separate accidents in Delhi
sub-heading: In three separate Road accidents in Delhi, two children died and six people were injured.

heading: Principal killed as car hits tree
sub-heading: A 60-year-old principal of a school died in a car accident on Monday morning in Ujjain district. The principal, Rekha Pillai, was traveling to DPs in Ujjain from Indore on Monday morning when her car rammed into a tree near Dhatravada village. She was rushed to hospital, where doctors declared her dead. Police said Rekha was principal of DPs for the last four to five years and would drive a car to Indore every Saturday and then return to school on Monday morning. Nagjhiri police said the body was handed over to family members after postmortem. DSP Vinod Meena said the accident is under investigation.

heading: Four among 25 injured critical as bus overturns in Odisha's Mayurbhanj
Man working as a female dancer loses legs and identity in Ara accident
sub-heading: A man from Bihar, who had lost both of his legs in a Road accident, is now battling to prove his male identity because he was registered as a woman in the hospital records. This deprives him of all the benefits of government welfare schemes that this poor man could urgently use at this moment. The hapless patient, with both his legs amputated up to his knees, lies on the beds at Patna Medical College and Hospital, hoping for justice. Santosh Sah, dressed as a female dancer, was on his way to perform at a social function at Ara in Bhojpur last month when he was hit by a speeding truck. The grievously wounded person was rushed to the local Ara Sadar Hospital by the villagers.

heading: 5 Fatehabad friends die in car-truck crash
sub-heading: Five friends on pilgrimage to Salasar from this city died in a Sunday night Road accident in Rajasthan's Sikar district, where they crashed their car head-on into a truck while overtaking another vehicle on the Fatehpur-Salasar highway.

heading: Ludhiana roads saw 23.2% more accidents last year
sub-heading: The city witnessed more than 23% rise in Road accidents in 2021 as compared with the preceding year, according to the National Crime Records Bureau (NCRB) report. Besides, the industrial hub recorded the highest road crash fatalities after five years.

heading: 2 killed & 4 injured in clash between 2 groups in Dausa
sub-heading: Two people, including a woman, were killed and four others sustained injuries during a clash between two groups in Dausa district on Monday, police said. Superintendent of police, Dausa, Sanjeev Nain said members of two families in Peeloda village clashed with each other over an old dispute involving a .

heading: Kanker accident: Another child succumbs to injuries
Madhya Pradesh: Two killed in 3 accidents in Mandsaur & Dewas districts
sub-heading: Two persons were killed and one injured in three Road accidents in two districts of Malwa-Nimar region in the last 24 hours. The two Road accidents were reported from YD Nagar area in Mandsaur district, where one person was killed and another injured, police said.

heading: 11 killed in Hisar, Sirsa accidents
sub-heading: Eleven people, including a couple, died in two Road accidents in Hisar and Sirsa districts on Thursday evening and late night. While six youths were killed when their car hit a tree in Hisar, five persons, including a couple, died in Sirsa when two cars collided.

heading: Ludhiana tops cities in deaths caused by accidents near factories in villages
sub-heading: The city witnessed more than 200 Road accident deaths in urban areas in 2021, the highest since 2015, suggests the latest National Crime Records Bureau (NCRB) report. According to the report, more than half of such deaths occurred near residential areas.

heading: 8 killed, 4 injured in 2 Himachal Pradesh road acidents
sub-heading: Eight people died and four others were injured in two Road accidents in Himachal Pradesh. While a speeding car killed five migrant labourers in Solan district on Tuesday morning, three people died after their car fell into a 400-feet deep gorge in Sirmaur district on Monday night.

heading: Doda police nab family that faked death in road mishap to evade huge loans
sub-heading: Doda police on Sunday brought back from Haryana a couple who faked their death along with their minor daughter in a Road accident under a well thought out plan to evade huge loans that they had taken. They are yet to be formally arrested.

heading: Student among 2 killed in accidents
sub-heading: A BTech student and a tractor trolley driver were killed in separate Road accidents in Mohall in the past 24 hours.

heading: NCRB report: Accidents killed 2,796 pedestrians in Bihar in 2021, highest in country
sub-heading: Deaths by accidents on roads and rail tracks increased by nearly 13% in Bihar in 2021 when compared to 2020, according to the latest National Crime Records Bureau (NCRB) report on accidental deaths and suicides in India (ADSI). The number of such accidents went up from 9,610 in 2020 to 10,863 in 2021.

heading: 80% of all fatal accidents happen on NHs and SHs: Study
sub-heading: Rear-end, head-on and pedestrian crashes were the top three accidents in the first half of the calendar year, reveals a study of Road accidents in Nagpur rural. The on-site in-depth crash investigation by JP Research India Pvt Ltd (JPRI), the founder and coordinator of the Sampling System-India (RASSI), reveals that in six months as many 249 s were reported in Nagpur rural.

heading: 11 hurt in 5 accidents on New Year’s eve
sub-heading: Two women and two kids were injured in five separate accidents on New Year's Eve in Bhopal. A 24-year-old bike rider and his friend were hurt after a speeding car hit them from behind in the intervening night of Saturday and Sunday. Police said that the injured Sagar 24, a DJ, resides in Bairagarh on Sunday around 2 AM when Sagar and his friend Gaurav were going out on a bike when a speeding car knocked them down. They were rushed to a nearby hospital by ambulance and a case was registered against the vehicle driver at Bairagarh Police Station. In another accident in Bairagarh, an unidentified speeding bike hit an 18-year-old girl on Saturday late night. Police said that injured Sanjana, a resident of Bairagarh, works as a domestic help on Sunday around 1220 AM when she was going to have dinner at a restaurant. A speeding bikeborne hit her Sanjana sustained multiple injuries and was undergoing treatment at a hospital. Meanwhile, in an accident reported at Ratibad Police Station, three people including a 3-year-old sustained grievous injuries after a speeding car hit their bike at a turn in Ratibad locality on Saturday.

heading: 312 pedestrians killed in accidents in 10 yrs
sub-heading: In a city known for its footpaths and cycle tracks, pedestrians are still one of the most vulnerable sections of people on roads.

heading: Chandigarh: 312 pedestrians killed in accidents in 10 years
sub-heading: In a city known for its footpaths and cycle tracks, pedestrians are still one of the most vulnerable sections of people on roads. The severity of the problem can be gauged from the fact that pedestrians accounted for 30% of total fatalities in s in the city in the past 10 years.

heading: Three plain districts account for 60% of accident deaths in Uttarakhand
sub-heading: While zig-zag hill roads are considered more vulnerable to accidents, three of the four plain districts in Uttarakhand account for over 60% of accident deaths in the Himalayan state.

heading: Student from Hyderabad in coma after car crash in US
sub-heading: A student from Hyderabad, Shree Likitha Pinnam, who is pursuing higher studies at Wichita State University (WSU) in Kansas, United States, suffered a head injury in a Road accident. She is battling for her life.

heading: Not following rules leading to rise in accidents, says Superintendent of Police
sub-heading: A day after four lives were claimed in five Road accidents across the state, superintendent of police (traffic) Bossuet Silva on Thursday said the main reason for the increase in the accidents is the public not following traffic rules.

heading: Villagers protest on ring road after accident
sub-heading: Angry villagers staged a protest after the death of a person in a Road accident on the ring road near Sithio village under Dhurwa police station area on Tuesday evening.

heading: 5 killed as car rams into migrant labourers in Himachal Pradesh's Dharampur
sub-heading: A car ploughed into a group of migrant labourers in Himachal Pradesh's Solan district on Tuesday, killing five and injuring four, police said. The accident occurred near Dharampur on the Shimla-Kalka national highway around 9:20 am when they were walking to work, according to police.

heading: Pitfalls of improved road conditions: More accidents & even more deaths
2 killed, 4 hurt in separate accidents
Cyrus Mistry death: International road safety body to audit accident-prone stretch of Mumbai-Ahmedabad highway
sub-heading: Taking cognizance of the recent road mishap which led to the death of the former chairman of Tata Group, Cyrus Mistry, Geneva-based International Road Federation (IRF) is set to conduct a road safety audit on the accident-prone section of the Mumbai-Ahmedabad highway, to identify and remove deficiencies on the section.

heading: Woman dies, son hurt in accident
sub-heading: A woman died on the spot and her son was severely injured in a Road accident at Krishna Lanka in Vijayawada city. The accident occurred when their car hit a lorry on the highway on the intervening night of Saturday.

heading: World's 1st bamboo crash barrier on Wani-Warora Road in Maharashtra
sub-heading: Bamboo is going great guns with the world's first 200m bamboo crash barrier, known as Kooch Kavach, being installed on Wani-Warora NH960 in the region.

heading: Holi mishap numbers jump more than double in Lucknow this year
sub-heading: Holi celebrations turned unpleasant for nearly 800 people in city who were either injured in Road accidents due to drunken driving or suffered from eye and skin allergies. This number was two and a half times more than 2022 when 368 such cases were reported during the festival of colours.

heading: Soldier dies in accident at Mandya
sub-heading: A soldier was killed in a Road accident in the city on Sunday. According to the police, the incident happened when bike-borne Kumar, who is serving in the Indian army, hit a truck near Karimane Gate on Anekere Street here.

heading: 12 killed as pickup vehicle falls into gorge in Uttarakhand's Chamoli
sub-heading: Twelve people, including two women, were killed and five others injured after a pickup vehicle they were travelling in skidded off the road and fell into a 700m-deep gorge on Dumak Road in Palla Jakhol village of Chamoli district on Friday evening

heading: Beemavaram Eshwari was on her way to fetch passport before crash in Hyderabad
sub-heading: Several years of Beemavaram Eshwari's hard work as a hospital worker had helped her son Arun become a software professional, who was scheduled to fly to the United States of America in the next couple of weeks.

heading: In Andhra Pradesh, Techie couple, daughter die in Karnataka road mishap
sub-heading: A techie couple and their four-year-old daughter died in a Road accident in Karnataka on Saturday. The victims are from Anantapur. The police have identified the deceased as Srikanth (41), Pratiksha (35) and Gamya (4).

heading: 2 walking by road killed in twin accidents, 6 hours apart in Gurgaon
sub-heading: Two men walking by the side of the road were knocked down by vehicles in Bilaspur area of the city, just six hours apart.

heading: Cops save street dog injured in accident, spend more than Rs 25,000 on treatment
Drunken driving cause for 95% of night accidents, says Goa's CM Pramod Sawant
sub-heading: PANAJI: Chief minister Pramod Sawant on Friday attributed nearly 95% of the Road accidents that happen at night to drunken driving. Stating that steps need to be taken to prevent drunken driving, the chief minister said that laws will be amended if the need arises.“There has been a rise in accidents at night and this may be because of driving under the influence of alcohol,” Sawant said.

heading: 3 killed as car rams into lorry in Nizamabad
sub-heading: Three persons were killed when the car in which they were travelling rammed a lorry coming from the opposite direction on Saturday at Armoor in Nizamabad district. According to police, all three - Ramesh, Mahesh and Ashok, who were travelling in the vehicle died on the spot.

heading: Biker killed in accident on Trimbak Road
sub-heading: A biker was killed in a Road accident after he was knocked down by a bus coming from the opposite direction on Trimbakeshwar Road.The deceased has been identified as Harish Jadhav, a native of Jalgaon, who was staying in Nashik.

heading: Upgrade technology in vehicles to prevent accidents, Odisha CM Naveen Patnaik tells carmakers
sub-heading: Chief minister Naveen Patnaik on Friday advised automobile manufacturers to upgrade the safety standards in vehicles by adopting latest technologies.

heading: Upgrade tech in vehicles to prevent accidents, Naveen tells carmakers
sub-heading: Chief minister Naveen Patnaik on Friday advised automobile manufacturers to upgrade the safety standards in vehicles by adopting latest technologies.

heading: HC orders ₹47L compensation to kin of cop killed in accident
sub-heading: A sessions court here awarded compensation of Rs 47,95,000 to family of a police head constable, who was killed in a Road accident.

heading: Ghaziabad: After spurt in crashes, fines for drink driving
sub-heading: Police have started a special drive against drunk driving in the city to prevent Road accidents. On Monday, cops stopped several vehicles for suspected drunk driving and issued challans to 74 drivers and seized three vehicles for the offence.

heading: 50 lakh people expected in Ayodhya on New Year
sub-heading: Amid a rough estimate that around 50 lakh people could visit Ayodhya on the New Year day, heavy security and crowd management arrangements have been put in place by Ayodhya police.

heading: ACL injuries in road crash worse than those sustained in sports
sub-heading: While anterior cruciate ligament (ACL) injuries are usually caused by stress exerted on the knees during sports and fitness activities, in India, Road accidents are a major reason for this injury, the latest victim, of course, being Rishabh Pant. The cricketer recently underwent surgery on his knee for injury to the ligament, which is one of the strong bands of tissue that connect the thigh bone to the shinbone.

heading: 60-yr-old killed as lorry hits him
sub-heading: A 60-year-old man was killed in a Road accident as he was hit by a speeding lorry near Manchalapeta in Kotabommali mandal of Srikakulam district. The deceased was identified as K Lakshman. Police said the incident took place when Lakshman was crossing the road.

heading: Potholes not sole reason for accidents, says Sawant
Man dies in accident, cops book society for negligence
sub-heading: A 26-year-old man died after losing his balance on his bike and crashing into a private residential society in Ludhiana. The police have charged the society with negligence for not having any signs warning of the speed breakers, and are investigating whether the man's death was due to that negligence.

heading: Ex-teacher, man die in accidents
sub-heading: Two people, including a woman, were killed in Road accidents in Mohali in the past 24 hours. Dhakauli resident Krishna Bhatia (65) died after a truck hit her scooter at a T-point near Dhakauli in Zirakpur. The victim was a retired yoga teacher. She was going to Panchkula to get medicines.

heading: Bike collides with trailer in Raigarh; mother, son killed
sub-heading: Raipur: A mother and son were killed in a Road accident after their bike collided head-on with a recklessly driven trailer in Raigarh late on Wednesday. A case was registered and the driver was taken into custody. The deceased family has been provided with a relief amount by the administration.

heading: Container truck driver rams multiple vehicles; 1 killed in Nashik
sub-heading: A speeding container truck knocked down multiple vehicles in the Yeola area of Nashik rural on the Yeola-Manmad Road around 7 pm on Tuesday, killing one man on the spot and leaving five others injured. The Yeola police arrested the driver and produced him before the court on Wednesday.

heading: Andhra Pradesh: 2 students die in accident in Guntur
sub-heading: In a tragic incident, two 22-year-old students were killed in a Road accident near Ponnekallu village of Tadikonda mandal in Guntur district on Wednesday night. Police said an unknown vehicle hit their two-wheeler, killing Namala Saikumar and Nutakki Nagamalleswara Rao on the spot.

heading: Police sniffer dog Oliver dies in accident
sub-heading: Oliver, a well-trained sniffer dog serving with the Hill Palace police squad, died in a Road accident near Seaport-Airport Road on Saturday night.

heading: 2 students die in accident in Guntur
sub-heading: In a tragic incident, two 22-year-old students were killed in a Road accident near Ponnekallu village of Tadikonda mandal in Guntur district on Wednesday night. Police said an unknown vehicle hit their two-wheeler, killing Namala Saikumar and Nutakki Nagamalleswara Rao on the spot.

heading: 51-year-old killed in accident in Bhopal; absconding driver booked
sub-heading: A 51-year-old man died after his scooter was hit by an unidentified vehicle, and his 14-year-old nephew was injured. The man's family filed a case against the driver of the vehicle, and police are investigating.

heading: Bus hits toll plaza; five injured
sub-heading: At least five passengers sustained injuries in a Road accident when a bus lost control and hit the toll plaza building on Suwasra Road in Sitamau area in Mandsaur district. The accident took place on Sunday mornin.

heading: Two killed in accident in trans-Ganga
sub-heading: Two persons were killed in a Road accident when a pickup van hit the bike carrying them near Mauaima toll plaza, Ramphal Innari on Prayagraj-Pratapgarh highway under the limits of Mauaima police station in trans-Ganga pocket of the Prayagraj district here on Sunday.

heading: Bihar: Eight killed, seven injured after a truck rams into religious procession
sub-heading: According to the police, the incident took place around 9pm on Mahnar- Hajipur main road under Desari police station area, when the locals have gathered on roadside under a tree to perform puja (prayer service) to worship Bhuiyan Baba. Amid the prayer service, an uncontrolled truck rammed people standing on the roadside and overturned on the spot after hitting the tree.

heading: 20% fatal accidents in Nashik region are hit-&-run cases
sub-heading: In 2022, there were 2700 fatal accidents in five districts of the Nashik region. 20 of these were hitandrun cases. The Nashik Range Special Inspector General of Police, Mr. Shekhar Patil, has instructed the superintendents of police in the five police units to ensure that the accused in hitandrun cases are arrested and tried in court. This is in response to the increasing number of accidents on roads, most of which are hitandrun cases. Mr. Patil also said that in 2021, there were 2530 fatal accidents in the region. 2120 of them were detected, while 16 were not detected. Mr. Patil has instructed the sps to ensure that the undetected hitandrun cases are detected and officers of the rank of police subinspector and above be given the work of detecting such cases. This will help to catch the drivers involved in hitandrun cases and make them more likely to be caught. However, by doing so, the drivers also leave the accident victim on the road when he or she can be saved if taken to the hospital at the earliest.

heading: Body of ITBP man killed in J&K mishap brought home
sub-heading: The body of the ITBP personnel, who was killed in a Road accident in Kashmir, was brought to his native Bhurmuni village in Pithoragarh on Thursday.

heading: Samaritans helping accident victims reach hospitals to get cash rewards
sub-heading: Any person who saves the life of Road accident victims by taking them to a nearby hospital will be given a financial reward, the Bokaro district administration said on Friday.DC Kuldeep Choudhary made the announcement after chairing a meeting of the district road safety committee.

heading: Two die in accident after Christmas gala in Hyderabad
sub-heading: Two youngsters, who were returning home after Christmas celebrations, died after they rammed their bike into a road divider in Jeedimetla in the early hours of Sunday.

heading: Minor among three dead, 19 injured in two separate incidents in J&K's Reasi, LG Manoj Sinha expresses grief
sub-heading: "Two person were killed and 19 others got injured when a passenger vehicle (Canter- JK11A-0215) carrying pilgrims to Cave Shrine of Shiv Khori skidded off the road and plunged into a gorge in Reasi district of Jammu region of Union Territory (UT)," officials said.

heading: As lights go kaput, commuters run risk of accidents on dark highways
sub-heading: Those driving vehicles from Ludhiana to Delhi should drive with caution, especially between Ludhiana and Khanna, as lights along the road on the National Highway are not working at many places. As per the last NCRB data, 140 persons died in s on national highways in Ludhiana in 2021.

heading: Pedestrians suffer most in road crashes
409 deaths in 659 accidents in 1st 5 months of 2022 in Uttarakhand
sub-heading: The accident in Nainital, which claimed nine lives early on Friday morning, has again raised concerns about road safety in Uttarakhand.

heading: 3 brain-dead patients save lives of 11 people
sub-heading: Three brain-dead patients, including a young serving soldier who completed his training and took oath as a "sepoy" on December 24 only, have helped save the lives of 11 people after their families decided to donate their vital organs. Two donations took place at R&R hospital while the third one happened at Medanta hospital in Gurgaon.

heading: Uttar Pradesh: In hospital, dog licks blood of injured man
sub-heading: A video of a dog licking blood oozing out from an injured man lying on the floor of the emergency ward of Kushinagar district hospital went viral on Thursday morning prompting district magistrate to remove 6 employees of the hospital for negligence.

heading: Dad, son among 3 killed in accidents
sub-heading: In different Road accidents in Barmer district three people died including a father and son and three persons were injured who are undergoing treatment at Barmer district hospital.

heading: 17-year-old girl died in accident, family donates her kidneys, liver in Nagpur
sub-heading: Family members of a 17-year-old girl student in the city, who died in a Road accident, decided to donate her kidneys and liver to needy patients. Zonal Transplant Coordination Centre (ZTCC) Nagpur informed that the organs gave three young patients a new lease of life. As per the wish of the family of the donor, authorities have not revealed their identity.

heading: 182 killed in 461 accidents in Nashik city in 2022
sub-heading: Overspeeding, rash driving and helmetless riding were the main reasons for the death of 182 people in 461 accidents in Nashik city in 2022, revealed the data compiled by the Nashik city police.

heading: 35-yr-old dies in bike accident
sub-heading: A 35-year-old biker, who was injured in a Road accident on October 29, died while undergoing treatment on Wednesday. Acting on information, Bilkhiria police registered a case and started investigations.

heading: Pune: Leopard dies in accident on highway
sub-heading: A nine-month-old male leopard was hit by a speeding vehicle on the Pune-Nashik highway at Kalamb village in Ambegaon tehsil on Sunday.

heading: Vishwas Sarang stops to help rush injured to hospital
sub-heading: Medical education minister Vishwas Sarang stopped his cavalcade and rushed to assist injured youngster on Jail Road. A good Samaritan gesture by the minister ensured two-wheeler rider was rushed to the hospital. He is said to be in stable condition.

heading: Gurgaon court awards Rs 34 lakh compensation to family of biker killed in accident
sub-heading: The Motor Accident Claims Tribunal of Gurgaon has awarded Rs 34.78 lakh compensation to the family of a 32-year-old biker who died in a Road accident in May 2022. The compensation amount will be jointly paid by the driver and the owner of the vehicle that caused the accident and the insurance company.

heading: 24-year-old killed after car hits bike, drags him for 12km in Surat
sub-heading: A 24-year-old man was killed after he was knocked down by a car and dragged for around 12 km after getting stuck under the fourwheeler in Surat, Gujarat. The gory incident revived memories of the Delhi Road accident, wherein a young woman had similarly lost her life. The hit-and-run accident occurred on the night of January 18 on the Kadodara Bardoli road. When the victim later identified as Sagar Patil was riding the bike while his wife was in the back seat, a police officer said on Tuesday that a citizen recorded the video of the speeding car on his mobile phone which helped the police in identifying the vehicle. The driver of the car will be arrested soon.

heading: Man dies in road mishap, driver flees
sub-heading: A man was killed in a Road accident when a vehicle driven by an unknown person hit him near Barwala. Police registered a case of hit and run.

heading: 3 die in Supaul, one in Aurangabad accidents
sub-heading: Three youths on a bike died in a Road accident due to dense fog in Supaul district early Wednesday morning.

heading: NCRB: 12.6% less people die due to accidents compared to 2020 in CG
sub-heading: Chhattisgarh has reported a decline in accidental deaths by 12.6% in 2021 as compared to 2020. The total number of accidental death was reported to be 17,525 in 2021 as compared to 20,057 in the year 2020. Delhi stands first with a decline in accidental deaths by 22.

heading: 5 kids among 12 killed after being run over by truck in Bihar
sub-heading: In a horrific Road accident, seven people, including five kids, were killed and eight others got seriously injured after a truck ran over them in a roadside settlement at Nayaganj in Vaishali district of Bihar late on Sunday evening. A PTI report put the toll at 12.

heading: ‘193 deaths in 313 rd accidents in Kumaon in 5 months, most due to overspeeding’
Visakhapatnam: Two killed as bike hits divider
sub-heading: Two persons were killed in a Road accident when their bike hit a divider near Boddavalasa village in Denkada mandal of Vizianagaram district on Tuesday. The deceased were identified as K Naidu (47) and M Eswar Rao (42).

heading: 32-yr-old dies in road mishap
sub-heading: Hyderabad: A cab driver (32) died in a Road accident after his bike was hit by a car at Raidurgam police. Officials said that the cab driver had picked up a customer from Nanakramguda and was heading towards Manikonda. But enroute, their bike was hit by a car. The rider died on the spot. TNN

heading: 8,424 accidents: Chattisgarh to take road safety measures
sub-heading: Amidst an increased number of fatal Road accidents recorded in the state that claimed over 8424 lives, Chhattisgarh is mulling over acknowledging and rewarding good Samaritans with an increased amount, to motivate people to help the injured ones.

heading: Chittoor man dies in Australia car accident
sub-heading: A 27-year-old man, Sai Rohit Paladugu from Polakala Yellampally village in Chittoor district, died on the spot in a car crash while travelling on Goulbourn Valley highway.

heading: Two minors among nine dead, 30 injured in three separate mishaps in Jammu
sub-heading: Union Minister Dr Jitendra Singh and Lt Governor J&K Manoj Sinha have expressed grief on the loss of life in the tragic Road accident in Kishtwar wherein a Passenger Taxi carrying commuters skidded off the road and fell into a deep gorge.

heading: Goa: Khandepar man dies in accident at Curti
sub-heading: Ashok Shyam Naik, 47, a resident of Gauthan, Khandepar, died in a fatal Road accident near Borim bypass junction at Curti, Ponda, on Saturday.

heading: Gujarat: 5 vehicles crash into each other near Bharuch, two people die
sub-heading: Three persons died in two different Road accidents in Bharuch district on Saturday morning. The victims in both the accidents were travelling in cars on the highway.The first accident took place early in the morning near Nabipur.

heading: Saturday declared ‘no accident day’
sub-heading: vijayawada bapatla police with an aim to reduce Road accidents in the district have declared every saturday as no accident day’ as part of this police personnel were deployed at 80 places in the district where Road accidents are reported every day bapatla sp vakul jindal inspected various spots on nh216 identified accidentprone areas and gave instructions to officers to prevent s he also reduce s he also...

heading: Madras HC issues notice to Tamil Nadu on uploading accident data online
sub-heading: Madras high court has ordered notice to the state government on a plea to upload details of motor accident cases online, to enable victims to file timely compensation claims.

heading: Kochi: Action plan to reduce number of accidents
sub-heading: The Greater Cochin Development Authority (GCDA) will take coordinated measures to minimize the number of accidents in Kochi.

heading: Youth dies in bike accident in Kolkata
sub-heading: A 23-year-old youth from Garfa was killed in a Road accident early on Shashthi when he was out on his bike to visit pandals with a friend. Ranjit Ghosh’s bike skidded on Lake Town-EM Bypass flyover around 5.

heading: Eight pilgrims killed in Andhra Pradesh as lorry rams into jeep
sub-heading: Eight persons, including three women, were killed in a gruesome Road accident in Alluri Sitharama Raju district on Tuesday.

heading: Maharashtra: Organs donated by brain dead woman give new lease of life to 3
sub-heading: A 38-year-old woman, who met with a Road accident in Jalgaon and was subsequently declared brain dead, is set to light up the lives of three patients and their families this Diwali by giving them a new lease of life.

heading: Five killed in separate road crashes in Rajasthan
sub-heading: Five people were killed in two separate Road accidents in Rajasthan's Jaipur and Sirohi districts on Thursday, police said.

heading: Andhra Pradesh: 4 killed after minivan rams into truck in Kakinada
sub-heading: Four persons were killed in a Road accident that occurred early on Wednesday on NH-16 near Mallepalli village in Kakinada district.

heading: BTech student killed as truck hits his Bullet in Greater Noida
sub-heading: A 24-year-old engineering student died while his friend — a BTech student of the same college as Sweety’s — was injured after a truck hit their Bullet in Greater Noida’s Alpha-1 early on Saturday. The truck driver has been arrested, police said.

heading: Bihar’s accident severity rate 2nd highest in country: Report
sub-heading: Despite the decline in number of Road accidents and fatalities in the state by 13.7% and 7.02%, respectively, in 2020, Bihar has reported the second highest accident severity rate (78) in the country, as per the latest report – ‘s in India 2020’ – prepared by the ministry of road transport and highways. The report was released on Wednesday.

heading: Kanpur accident: Station in-charge suspended
sub-heading: After 26 people were killed in Road accident in Ghatampur, station in-charge of Saadh police station was suspended for negligence. Action has also been taken against 4 Police Response Vehicle for not reaching at right time.

heading: Alappuzha MP hurt in accident
sub-heading: Alappuzha MP AM Ariff was injured in a Road accident in Cherthala in Alappuzha on Thursday.

heading: 3 minors among 8 killed in accidents in Betul, Harda & Dhar
sub-heading: Eight people were killed and one person injured in three Road accidents in Betul, Dhar and Harda districts of Madhya Pradesh, police said on Monday.

heading: Goa: Drunk driving spikes accident cases reaching GMC post 9pm
sub-heading: Of the 260-odd cases reported daily at the casualty department of the state’s biggest hospital, GMC, during a day, around 80 to 100 are accidents related — road and industrial — as also those from bordering districts of Karnataka and Maharashtra.

heading: Pune: 4 people killed in separate accidents
sub-heading: Three motorcyclists and a pedestrian were killed in separate Road accidents since Monday in Hadapsar, Loni Kalbhor and on the Pune-Ahmednagar highway stretch under the Airport police.

heading: Body of accident victim exhumed
sub-heading: Body of a Road accident victim was exhumed after three and half months when Bilaspur police reached his village to record his statement assuming that he would have recovered from the injuries.

heading: Four of family killed after car sandwiched between trucks
sub-heading: Four persons including a Deputy Executive Engineer of the Panchayat Raj department and two of his family members died in a Road accident in the Adilabad district when their car crashed into a truck from behind after it was hit by another heavy vehicle on Sunday night.

heading: Brain dead woman’s lungs airlifted
sub-heading: A family of a brain dead patient donated the patient's lungs which were airlifted to another hospital in India. Malathi's husband was riding the scooter while she was a pillion, and both of them were wearing helmets, but Malathi's helmet was not locked, which caused her head injury when the scooter was hit. Her hospital said on Monday that Malathi was immediately rushed to another hospital and later was shifted to an ICU for life support and intensive care. Her condition worsened, and at 903pm she was declared brain dead due to brain stem failure. Her family came forward to donate her organs, and her organs (lungs, liver, 2 kidneys, heart valves, and corneas) were harvested on Monday. The lungs were airlifted to another hospital in India, and a green corridor was created between the hospitals. The liver and left kidney were transplanted at the hospital, and the right kidney was transplanted at another hospital. The heart valves were sent to a hospital in Bengaluru, and the corneas were sent to a hospital in the city. G. Bharateesha Reddy, Vice President of Apollo BGS Hospitals, thanked the traffic police, airport staff, and the Karnataka State Industrial

heading: SUV meets with accident, 17-yr-old dies
sub-heading: A 17-year-old girl died and several others suffered injuries in a Road accident near Khanna on Delhi-Amritsar national highway on Monday. The deceased was identified as Simran.

heading: In Chennai, biker sans helmet crashes into median, dies with pillion rider
sub-heading: Two men going on a bike died near Jafferkhanpet in the wee hours of Monday after the rider lost control and the two-wheeler slammed into the median. The deceased were identified as S Jayasuriya, 26, of Tiruvannamalai and K Prem Kumar, 28, of Karur. Police said both men were not wearing helmets.

heading: Biker sans helmet crashes into median, dies with pillion rider
sub-heading: Two men going on a bike died near Jafferkhanpet in the wee hours of Monday after the rider lost control and the two-wheeler slammed into the median. The deceased were identified as S Jayasuriya, 26, of Tiruvannamalai and K Prem Kumar, 28, of Karur.

heading: 3 of 4 on bike killed after accident
sub-heading: Headed for a fair on just one motorcycle, two men and a woman were killed, and their fourth companion injured, in a Road accident near Amritsar on Saturday.The three deceaed people and the injured woman were travelling from Ajnala to Talwandi Nahar when the accident took place.

heading: 60% brain injuries due to accidents, avoidable: Doctors
6 get new lease of life with brain dead man’s organs in Tamil Nadu
sub-heading: The organs of a 32-year-old man who was declared brain dead following a Road accident at Natham in Dindigul district have given a new lease of life to six people.

heading: Telangana: Three of family killed after DCM rams bike
sub-heading: The van hit the bike from behind in order to avoid hitting a four-wheeler, which was moving ahead of the van. All the three sustained head injuries and died on the spot

heading: Boy dead, 1 injured as bus rams bike
sub-heading: A 16-year-old boy riding pillion died while the rider, a spinning mill worker, suffered grievous injuries in a Road accident near Rajapalayam in Virudhunagar district on Saturday night.

heading: Thane: Union minister Kapil Patil stops convoy, admits accident victim to hospital
sub-heading: Union minister of state for Panchayati Raj, Kapil Patil, who was on a visit to Murbad, looking at an accident on road immediately stopped his convoy and admitted the injured driver to a nearby hospital.

heading: Finally, crash barriers for 3.4km on Noida e-way
sub-heading: The Greater Noida Authority on Tuesday installed crash barriers for 3.4 km on both arms of the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway from Pari Chowk to the Noida side.

heading: Senior journalist succumbs to accident injuries
Chennai: Special task force identifies 104 accident hotspots
sub-heading: A month after being formed to come up with solutions to bring down the number of accidents on the roads, the special task force headed by additional director general of police Vinit Wankhede and comprising experts from IIT Madras and officials from Greater Chennai Corporation and state highways department, has identified 104 accident hotspots across the city.

heading: Kerala: 37-year-old woman succumbs to accident injuries
sub-heading: A 37-year-old woman who met with a Road accident on Saturday morning succumbed to her injuries on Sunday.The deceased has been identified as Vineetha, wife of Biju, Pathaamkuzhi, Udayamperoor. Her scooter was knocked down by a truck near Pathaam Mile at Udayamperoor on Saturday morning.

heading: 21-year-old killed in two-wheeler mishap
sub-heading: A 21-year-old man died in a Road accident near Choorakkad at Tripunithura around 7.30am on Thursday. The deceased has been identified as Anvin, son of Binu, of Vezhaparambu near Mulanthuruthy. His father is a sub-inspector with the City police.

heading: Two of family killed in accident in Rajnandgaon
sub-heading: Two members of a family, including the president of Dongargarh Sikh Samaj, were killed in a Road accident.

heading: Jammu and Kashmir: Five killed, 28 injured in two separate road mishaps in Rajouri
sub-heading: The fatalities were reported just in less than 24 hrs when 11 persons were killed and 27 others injured in a Road accident in Mandi tehsil of adjacent Poonch district.

heading: Three including woman killed in accidents in 24 hrs
sub-heading: Three persons, including a woman, were killed in separate Road accidents in three districts in the last 24 hours.A 19-year-old boy was killed and two, including a girl, sustained injuries when his two-wheeler rammed into a divider near an intersection in Indore late on Monday.

heading: Bolpur traffic police OC dies in accident
sub-heading: A young sub-inspector of Bolpur traffic police died in a Road accident while he was returning to his quarters early on Tuesday.

heading: Body of biker killed in accident remains on road for 1½ hours
sub-heading: The body of a biker who died in a Road accident on the new flyover in Koyambedu remained there for about one-and-a-half hours in the wee hours of Wednesday before it was identified and sent to Kilpauk Medical College (KMC) hospital.

heading: Mysuru: Brain-dead man’s organs donated
sub-heading: Heart valves, liver, kidney, and corneas of a brain-dead mechanical engineer were harvested at a Mysuru hospital on Friday.

heading: 3, including 1-month-old, die in separate accidents
sub-heading: Three persons, including a one-month-old boy, were killed in separate Road accidents. Police said a 45-day-old boy, along with his mother K Sharmila and family members, was travelling in an auto-rickshaw.

heading: Artiste from Bihar loses legs, and identity, in accident
sub-heading: After losing both his legs in a Road accident, a man from Bihar is now battling hard to prove his male identity because he is registered as a woman in the hospital records - not once but twice, thus depriving him of all the benefits of government welfare schemes that this poor man earning livelihood as a female dancer urgently required at this moment. The hapless patient with both his legs amputated up to knees lies on the beds at PMCH hoping for justice.

heading: 1.5k+ killed on Mum-Goa h’way
sub-heading: As many as 1,512 people lost their lives in Road accidents on the Mumbai-Goa highway between 2012 and 2022, state PWD minister Ravindra Chavan told the state assembly. “A total of 6,692 accidents took place on the stretch, and 1,512 people lost their lives,” he said.

heading: 3 youths die in Hubballi accident
sub-heading: Three youths were killed, and another was injured in a Road accident occurred at Tarihal here on Thursday night.The mishap occurred when they were returning from their work, and the two bikes, that they were riding, rammed into a parked truck.

heading: Yavatmal gynaecologist Dr Surekha Berlota dies in accident
sub-heading: A well-known gynaecologist of Yavatmal Dr Surekha Berlota was killed in a ghastly Road accident on the national highway between Hyderabad and Nirmal on Tuesday, while three others sustained injuries.

heading: Hospitals get ready for quick response to accident victims
sub-heading: With accidents on highways and expressways common during foggy days in winter, hospitals are on the alert to quickly respond to such emergencies. Doctors said treating injured patients within the golden hour can help save lives.

heading: Kolkata: 2 techies among 3 injured as car jumps red light in Salt Lake
sub-heading: Three persons including two IT employees were injured in a Road accident at Salt Lake Sector V on Saturday morning when a car jumped a red signal and dashed a car before hitting two pedestrians.

heading: Bihar govt hires shooters to kill nilgais, boars to save crops
sub-heading: The Bihar government has hired 13 professional shooters to kill wild boars and 'ghodparas' or nilgais to save crops, a forest official said on Tuesday.

heading: 4 killed, 14 hurt in separate fog-related accidents in Uttar Pradesh
sub-heading: Four persons were killed and left 14 others were injured in separate Road accidents apparaently caused due to low visibility following foggy weather conditions in the region on Monday.

heading: Tamil Nadu: 2 killed as TNSTC bus rams truck near Perambalur
sub-heading: A driver and conductor employed with Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation (TNSTC) were killed in a Road accident as the state-owned bus rammed a metal rod-laden truck from behind on Trichy-Chennai national highway in Perambalur district on Saturday morning.

heading: Andhra Pradesh: 148 accident deaths on Bhakrapet ghat road in 5 years
sub-heading: On March 26, nine members of a marriage party from Dharmavaram in Anantapur district were killed and 44 others injured when the bus they were travelling in lost control and fell into a gorge on the Bhakrapet ghat road. In fact, 18 persons have lost their lives and 76 injured in about 18 s on the two stretches in the first three months of the year alone, which includes the March 26 accident.

heading: Woman, lover held for killing husband in Tamil Nadu’s Tiruchirappalli district
sub-heading: A 35-year-old woman and her 21-year-old lover were arrested on Monday for murdering her husband and covering it up like a Road accident. They were planning to lead a happy life with the insurance coverage taken by the deceased.

heading: Another accident in hills: 5 killed as car falls into gorge in Uttarkashi
sub-heading: Five people were killed and one person was critically injured after a private car they were traveling in fell into a 800m-deep gorge in Brahmkhal region of Uttarkashi district on Saturday afternoon.

heading: Sarabjit’s wife dies in accident
sub-heading: Sukhpreet Kaur, wife of Sarabjit Singh, an Indian who died in a Pakistan jail, died on Monday as a result of Sunday’s Road accident in which she fell off the pillion seat of a two-wheeler near Fatehpur in this district. She will be cremated on Tuesday at her native place Bhikhiwind.

heading: 3 Telugu students killed in minivan accident in US
sub-heading: Three Indian students, two from Telangana and one from Andhra Pradesh, have died in a Road accident in New Haven in the US. Although the accident took place early on Tuesday morning, details emerged only on Thursday.

heading: Pune-Mumbai Expressway stretch saw more crash deaths in 2022 than 2021
sub-heading: The stretch between Kiwale toll post and Amrutanjan Point on the Pune-Mumbai expressway saw as many as 28 Road accident deaths last year, up from 22 in 2021.

heading: Couple who lost son in car accident attempt suicide
sub-heading: Unable to overcome the loss of their son, who was killed in a Road accident recently, a husband-wife duo attempted to die by suicide by consuming poison at their house near Kanuvai Road on the outskirts of the city on Tuesday noon.

heading: College girl succumbs to accident injuries
Despite new rules, 50 fatal accidents in three months in Goa
sub-heading: PORVORIM: Fifty fatal accidents have taken place in the state between April and June 2022, despite implementation of higher fines under the new Motor Vehicles Act, transport minister Mauvin Godinho said on Thursday, in a reply tabled in the assembly. Godinho also said that so far Rs six crore has been collected in fines from violators during the same period from April to June.

heading: Centre submits incorrect data on accidents in Tamil Nadu
sub-heading: Due to the failure on the part of the Union road transport ministry to note changes made by Tamil Nadu in the state's Road accident data, Parliament has provided incorrect old figures to suggest that the state saw a sharp rise in accidents in 2021.

heading: Civic neglect: Bengaluru has most deaths by pothole-related accidents
sub-heading: With deaths caused by pothole-related accidents occurring at metronomic regularity in India's IT hub, it comes as no surprise that Bengaluru is leading the country's major cities in the count for deaths caused 'due to negligence of civic bodies'.

heading: Andhra Pradesh: Four killed as car rams parked lorry
sub-heading: Four friends died in a Road accident on Tuesday after the car in which they were travelling collided with a parked lorry.

heading: Organs of brain dead man give new lease of life for seven patients in TN
Close shave for Telangana CID chief, wife dies in Rajasthan crash
sub-heading: Telangana director general of police (CID) Govind Singh Jatav was injured and his wife Sheela Singh, 55, killed in a Road accident near Tanot-Ghantiyali area in Jaisalmer on Monday morning.

heading: Man, son killed as ambulance hits tractor
sub-heading: A 45-year old man and his father returning home after getting a rotavor machine installed on their tractor cleared from the agriculture department were killed in a Road accident near Barwala on Monday.

heading: TANA board director’s wife and daughter killed in fatal car crash in US
sub-heading: TANA (Telugu Association of North America) board director Dr Kodali Nagendra Srinivas lost his wife and two daughters in a fatal Road accident in Waller County, USA.

heading: Kanpur accident: UP CM Yogi Adityanath meets kin, assures them of all help
sub-heading: The vehicles should be used only for the purpose they are made, appealed Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath after meeting the injured of the two accidents at Lala Lajpat Rai (LLR) Hospital in Kanpur on Sunday.

heading: Punjabi singer Alfaaz injured in freak accident
sub-heading: Punjabi singer Amanjot Singh Pannu, popularly known as Alfaaz, was injured in a freak Road accident on Banur-Landran road in the early hours of Sunday. A vehicle hit him while he was answering a call of nature at a roadside.

heading: Kolkata: One dead, one injured in accidents
sub-heading: A man died and another was seriously injured in two Road accidents between Saturday evening and Sunday morning.

heading: Boy's speeding motorcycle on wrong side crashes into car in Pune
sub-heading: A boy (16) suffered serious back injury and two other teenagers (15 and 18) riding pillion on his bike fractured their legs after the motorcycle, on the wrong side of the road, collided with a car on January 2 at Ambi village in Maval taluka.

heading: Five die in separate accidents in state
sub-heading: patnadarbhanga five persons were killed and patna and darbhanga on saturdaythree persons were killed after their vehicle collided with a container truck at amhra naya road on the bihtabikram main road late in the morning a biker was killed while the pillion rider got injured in a headon collision with a truck two other died after their suv ramped into a truck in bihta all of them died.

heading: Biker killed after being hit by speeding vehicle
sub-heading: A bike-borne man was killed when a speeding container ran over him in Lasudia area on Monday.The accident took place at 10 pm when a container hit the two-wheeler rider near Nipania turn on Indore-Dewas bypass.

heading: Ranchi: Three school girls killed, one seriously injured as truck hit them
sub-heading: The girls, in the age group of 11 and 13 years, were returning from their school Bhaskar Saraswati Shishu Mandir, Bundu, in the afternoon when the incident took place on Tata-Ranchi National Highway-33 under Bundu police station area, police said.

heading: Hubballi: BJP leader Nagesh Kalburgi's son dies in accident
sub-heading: Huda former chairman and BJP leader Nagesh Kalburgi's son Tilak Kalburgi, 18, died in a Road accident at Tarihal Bypass on Sunday night.

heading: Black Wednesday: Four lose lives, 13 injured in five separate accidents
sub-heading: Four persons were killed in three separate Road accidents between Tuesday night and Wednesday evening, in less than 24 hours. Two more accidents occurred late Wednesday evening, bringing the total number of injured to 13.

heading: Madhya Pradesh: Warden killed, teacher hurt as dumper hits car
sub-heading: A hostel warden was killed, while a teacher was grievously injury in a Road accident on underhconstruction Indore-Ichhapur highway in Khandwa.The incident took place near Deshgaon ghat on the highway on Saturday night, when a fast-moving dumper hit their car.

heading: On way to Murthal, 2 friends die in accident
sub-heading: Two friends, aged 21 and 19 years, were killed in a Road accident while they were going on a bike to a Murthal dhaba for the first time on Saturday night. Investigators suspect it to be a case of hit and run, but are also probing if they collided with a heavy object.

heading: Over 150 people suffer burns during Diwali celebrations
sub-heading: Diwali celebrations ended in tragedy for about 150 people, including 10 who sustained eye injury while bursting crackers. KGMU trauma centre received 40 victims who were injured either in fire related or Road accidents on Diwali.

heading: Cyrus Mistry accident: Hong Kong Mercedes-Benz experts arrive
sub-heading: A team of Mercedes-Benz officials from Hong Kong arrived in Mumbai on Monday to inspect the car which crashed last week, killing former Tata Sons chairman Cyrus Mistry and his friend, and injuring two other occupants, a police officer said.

heading: 7 killed as 2 cars plunge into stream in Jammu and Kashmir's Doda
sub-heading: One more person was injured in the two accidents that occurred on the Doda-Bhaderwah road within a span of six hours, Senior Superintendent of Police (SSP), Doda, Abdul Qayoom said, adding that the victims included two married couples.

heading: Two die in Ratibad accidents in 24 hours
sub-heading: Two people died in two separate Road accidents in Ratibad during the past 24 hours. In the first incident, a 20-year-old biker died while his friend sustained grievous injuries after a speeding truck knocked them down in Ratibad on Tuesday.

heading: Himachal Pradesh: 4 killed, 25 injured in two separate accidents in last 24 hours
sub-heading: In two separate Road accidents Himachal Pradesh has reported 4 deaths and 25 injuries during last 24 hours.

heading: Woman dies in pothole related accident in Bengaluru, CM Basavaraj Bommai orders probe
sub-heading: Chief minister Basavaraj Bommai on Tuesday directed the police to conduct a preliminary inquiry based on the complaint received and report back, as he also assured prompt action.

heading: Brain dead Coimbatore college student gives new lease of life to eight patients
2 brain-dead patients save several lives
sub-heading: On Wednesday, Kerala did 10 organ transplants from two brain-dead persons. The first donor was a 48 year old, Anitha from Nagercoil, who had suffered brain haemorrhage and was admitted to a private hospital in Thiruvananthapuram. She was declared brain dead on September 21.

heading: Court orders ₹1.22cr compensation to family of car crash victims
sub-heading: A sessions court here on Thursday awarded a compensation of over Rs 1.22 crore to the families of six persons, who were killed in a Road accident in Tamil Nadu while travelling from Kanyakumari to Madurai four years ago.Six persons were injured in the incident.

heading: Pune: Three rob injured man of cash, goods worth Rs 56,000
sub-heading: Three men robbed an injured Road accident victim of cash, a cellphone and his motorcycle, totally worth Rs 56,000, in the ghat section near Khed on October 26. The Pune rural police on Tuesday tracked and arrested the trio and recovered the stolen bike.

heading: Joint BDO, riding pillion, dies in Howrah accident
sub-heading: The joint BDO of Shyampur near Uluberia in Howrah died in a Road accident on Monday night when he was returning home after work. He was riding pillion on a bike and was hit by a truck from behind.

heading: ‘Most Bokaro accidents on NH-28, 23’
sub-heading: The district road safety committee on Saturday said most of the Road accidents in Bokaro are happening on National Highways 28 and 23, and serious measures must be taken to control them.

heading: Dwarka, KK Wagh College areas most accident-prone
sub-heading: With 21 Road accidents in the Dwarka area and 13 near K K Wagh College in the last three years, these two places have emerged as the most accident-prone spots in the city. Nashik city has 15 black spots.

heading: Kanpur accident: UP CM Yogi Adityanath visits village that lost 26 people, assures kin of all help
sub-heading: After cancelling his Balrampur tour, CM Yogi Adityanath reached Kanpur on Sunday afternoon. The CM straightaway went to the LLR Hospital and met the injured of both the accidents in the emergency.

heading: Noida sees a rise in accidents in 3 months of 2022
sub-heading: Road accidents and fatalities have increased in the first three months of this year compared to the corresponding period of the previous year in Noida. The district recorded 223 Road accidents between January and March against 195 during the same period last year.

heading: Man accused of killing 4 kids in Mira road caught at Mumbai airport after 28 years
sub-heading: Over 28 years after a woman and her four minor children were murdered in Mira Road, the police got their first breakthrough with the arrest of Rajkumar Chauhan, now 47, who arrived from Qatar at the city airport on Thursday.

heading: Rajasthan: Three NHs to be made accident-free, says ACS
sub-heading: The state government has decided to make three NHs accident-free. These include Shahjahanpur to Ajmer (NH 448), Bar-Bilara-Jodhpur (NH 25) and Sikar to Bikaner (NH 110). ACS transport Abhay Kumar said the initiative has been taken in compliance with the budget announcement.

heading: 52-yr-old brain dead woman gives new lease of life to six people
sub-heading: A 52-year-old brain-dead woman from Namakkal who suffered grievous injuries in a Road accident gave a new lease of life to six people with her family coming forward to donate her organs.

heading: Min helps mishap victims reach hosp
sub-heading: Minister for information technology Gudivada Amarnath on Sunday turned a good samaritan by lending a helping hand to Road accident victims near Lankelapalem in Anakapalle district.

heading: Four women killed as cars collide head-on in Trichy
sub-heading: Four women were killed and four others including a 7-year-old boy sustained grievous injuries in a tragic Road accident that happened near Thuvarankuruchi in Trichy district on Wednesday evening.

heading: Rajasthan: 2 killed, 2 injured after bus hits car in Barmer
sub-heading: Two persons were killed and two injured in a Road accident on Wednesday in Shiv area of Barmer district. The family was on its way to Ramdevra from Gujarat when their car collided with a bus. The deceased were brother and sister.

heading: ‘Mostly, health workers bring accident victims’
sub-heading: Almost 75% of unknown patients rushed to Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGI) after Road accidents were brought by ambulance drivers and health care workers, instead of police personnel, found a study done in the institute.

heading: Karnataka CM announces Rs 5 lakh each to family of 9 killed in Dharwad accident
sub-heading: Karnataka chief minister Basavaraj Bommai on Sunday announced Rs 5 lakh each to the family of those killed in a Road accident in Dharwad district.

heading: Nashik: Pillion rider dies in accident on highway
sub-heading: A 45-year-old man was killed in a Road accident on the Mumbai-Agra highway in front of the Panchavati College in Nashik city.The man was riding pillion on a scooter, which was knocked down by a speeding truck. The deceased has been identified as Santosh Pal, a resident of Satpur.

heading: Brain dead man’s organs benefit seven
sub-heading: The organs of a 35-year-old man from Ramanathapuram who was declared brain dead after a Road accident were harvested and transplanted in seven patients.

heading: Hry using tech to identify accident-prone areas, says CS
sub-heading: Haryana chief secretary Sanjeev Kaushal on Thursday said that the state is using live map technology to identify accident-prone areas. Using this technology, a grid is automatically generated for such places on the live map and the police gets information about such places immediately.

heading: 734 deaths in 1,927 accidents in Nagpur, yet RTO gets mere Rs 2.05 lakh Road Safety Fund
sub-heading: Though the district witnessed 734 fatalities in 1,927 Road accidents in 2021 alone and over 60 black spots have been identified which need immediate corrective measures, the transport department comprising City, East and Rural RTOs has received a minuscule Rs2.05 lakh as Road Safety Fund (RSF).

heading: Palghar: Man who lost both legs in accident to get Rs 73 lakh
sub-heading: A 44-year-old man who lost both legs in a Road accident in 2018 has been awarded a compensation of Rs 73 lakh by a Lok Adalat in Palghar district.

heading: Punjab govt to fix CCTV cameras to check fatal accidents
sub-heading: Punjab would install CCTV cameras across the state to reduce the death rate in Road accidents.

heading: 33 lost lives in accidents between 9pm & 3am: Cops
sub-heading: As many as 33 people out of 68 were killed this year between 9pm and 3am till date. UT traffic police data revealed that 31 fatal accidents took place between 9pm and 6am and 33 people have lost their lives so far. The city has also reported 145 non fatal accidents so far this year.

heading: 82 died in 135 accidents from 2019 to 2021 at Nashik city black spots
sub-heading: The Mirchi Hotel junction, where Saturday’s bus-truck collision on Saturday killed 12 and left 40 injured, is among the 15 identified black spots in Nashik city, senior police officers have said.

heading: Bengaluru: Bescom, private firm staffers die in accidents
sub-heading: Two people, including a meter reader with Bescom, were killed in different Road accidents reported on Sunday morning.

heading: Doctors in Delhi perform complex face rebuilding of accident victim
sub-heading: A team of doctors from Sir Ganga Ram Hospital has successfully performed a complex surgical procedure to pull out an accident victim — a 20-year-old Delhi-based IT professional — from the jaws of death and reconstructed his face which was crushed beyond recognition.

heading: Punjab: 3 killed in hit-run cases in Mohali
sub-heading: Three persons lost their lives in separate hit and run Road accident cases in the last 24 hours in Mohali. The police said, in one accident, a 64-year-old man was crushed to death after a truck hit him from behind, while he was crossing the road near a bus stand in Kharar.

heading: Mumbai: No let-off for scooterist who hit couple, caused toddler injuries
sub-heading: Refusing to grant leniency, a magistrate's court sentenced a 24-year-old student to 6 months' rigorous imprisonment for attempting to flee after ramming his bike into a couple in Andheri in 2019, causing their 1.5-year-old daughter to fall out of their arms and suffer a head injury.

heading: Pedestrian & biker killed in hit-and-run cases in Bhopal
sub-heading: In the first incident, a 17-year-old boy died when a speeding SUV hit their bike from behind. Investigating officer, head constable Rupesh Jadon said that the deceased, Varun Jatav, resided with his family members in the raisen district. In the second incident, a 45-year-old man was knocked down by a speeding bike in govindpura locality around a week ago while he was walking down towards his home after getting down from a bus. Police said that the deceased, Ranjit Singh, resided with his family including wife, Vandana, daughter, Akanksha, 18, and a younger son at Kali Badi Gvindpura. He worked as an electrician at a distillery plant around a week ago. On December 15, when Ranjit was returning home from the distillery, the company bus dropped him near Gandhi TriSection in govindpura. He was walking towards his house when a speeding biker coming from Awadhpuri side knocked him in front of Kali Badi. He sustained multiple injuries and was rushed to AIIMS Hospital where he died while undergoing treatment. A case was registered at Govindpura Police Station and further investigations are underway.

heading: Brain-dead girl, 10, becomes youngest organ donor in Pune
sub-heading: A 10-year-old brain-dead girl, who suffered fatal injuries in a Road accident, became the youngest organ donor in the Pune zone after her parents consented to donate her vital organs on November 7, saving three patients with life-threatening conditions.

heading: Birpur deaths: 4 cops injured in mob attack
sub-heading: The Supaul police on Sunday resorted to lathicharge and fired tear gas shells to disperse a violent mob which attacked the police personnel and damaged their vehicles in Birpur town area of the district.

heading: Four killed in fog-related accidents in Punjab & Haryana
sub-heading: Four persons died in Road accidents due to fog in Punjab and Haryana on Tuesday.

heading: 7 schoolchildren killed in auto rickshaw-truck collision in Chhattisgarh's Kanker district
145 two-wheeler riders killed in crashes in Gurugram, but fatality rate falls
sub-heading: Deaths of two-wheeler riders in Road accidents has come down by 14% as compared to last year. Between January and November 2021, a total of 169 two-wheeler riders died in crashes in the city, which accounted for 46% of all road fatalities (366). This year, a total of 357 people lost their lives in the same period, of whom 145 (40.6%) were two-wheeler riders, according to city police data.

heading: 398 people died in road mishaps in Prayagraj range in last 4 months
sub-heading: As many as 398 people have died in 759 Road accidents between January 1 and April 30 this year in four districts of range. Ironically, the Sangam city has once again topped the chart of Road accidents in terms of fatal and non-fatal category accidents.

heading: 2 die, 13 hurt in Sikar, Dausa accidents
sub-heading: Two people were killed and 13 others injured in two separate Road accidents in Sikar and Dausa districts since Sunday evening.

heading: Bihar: Two drown in boat mishap in Vaishali
sub-heading: At least two persons drowned after the boat they were travelling in capsized in Tirhut canal in Vaishali district on Wednesday. The deceased were identified as Rajesh Kumar (22) of Rohua under Bhagwanpur police station area and Anil Sah (35) from Amritpur.

heading: Lucknow: 15,000 people to get orthopaedic tips from top surgeons
sub-heading: Orthopaedic surgeons in the state have started training people, including cops, as `first responders' capable of giving on-the-spot first aid to victims of Road accidents.The target is to train a record 15,000 people in a week starting from August 1.

heading: 24-yr-old accident victim’s organs help give new lease of life to 3 patients
Kolkata: Biker killed after being hit by truck
sub-heading: A helmetless biker was killed, and another is battling for his life after being hit by heavy goods vehicles in two separate Road accidents in Ultadanga and Taratala early on Sunday and Saturday evening.

heading: UP: 3 schoolchildren die, one injured after car runs over them in Gonda
sub-heading: Three schoolchildren were mowed down by a car, while one sustained serious injuries in Colonelganj area of Gonda on Tuesday. The four children were walking towards their school.

heading: Locals block road after 2 die in accident
sub-heading: Traffic came to a standstill on the Kanpur-Sagar highway near Makranv village in Hamirpur district on Tuesday after locals staged a road blockade to protest against a Road accident involving a truck in which two persons were killed. The driver fled with the truck after the accident.

heading: All in a day: 3 youths killed in three separate accidents
sub-heading: Three people were killed in Road accidents in different areas of the city in the last 24 hours.In the first incident, a 20-year-old man was crushed to death while two others were severely injured in the Nigohan area.

heading: Prahladnagar, Bodakdev top accident spots in Ahmedabad
sub-heading: From October 2021 to November 2022, the city recorded 22,000-odd road traffic accidents (RTA) according to EMRI 108 data, at an average of 61 cases daily.

heading: Drop in Goa’s accident numbers, but rate still 4 times national average
sub-heading: Even as Goa’s Road accident numbers have dropped, it continued to have the highest rate in the country, with no other state or Union territory coming close to its figure of 109.4 accidents per lakh population.

heading: 11 killed, 19 injured as mini-bus slips into gorge in Jammu & Kashmir's Poonch
sub-heading: As many as 11 people were killed and several others suffered injuries in a mini-bus accident in Sawjian area of Jammu & Kashmir's Poonch district on Wednesday.

heading: Kochi: 17-year-old boy succumbs to accident injuries
sub-heading: A 17-year-old boy who was undergoing treatment at a private hospital in Kochi after a Road accident succumbed to injuries around 12.45pm on Monday.The deceased has been identified as Rohit B Elias of Koothattukulam.

heading: Ujjain accident: Injured students under observation in hospitals
sub-heading: The 11 students who were injured in a Road accident on Unhel-Nagda road on Monday, are under observation in hospitals in Ujjain, Nagda and Indore while surgeries have been planned for some.

heading: CS: Identify mishap-prone areas & take remedial steps
sub-heading: Chief secretary Usha Sharma on Monday directed officials to ensure that ambulances reach accident sites without delay so that the injured could get prompt medical care at hospitals. She directed officers to identify the accident-prone areas and ensure remedial action.

heading: Five killed, eight injured in separate accidents
sub-heading: Five persons were killed and eight got injured in two separate Road accidents in early morning hours on Friday in Auraiya district after UPSRTC bus of Auraiya depot, allegedly coming from the wrong side, collided with a four-wheeler carrying nine persons on Bela-Bidhuna road.

heading: Campaign to reduce accident black spots launched in Nashik
sub-heading: Kulwant Kumar Sarangal, the additional director general of police (traffic), on Tuesday expressed his concerns that although the conditions of roads have improved, the number of Road accidents in the state has not declined.

heading: Rajasthan: 2 killed, four hurt in separate accidents
sub-heading: Two persons were killed and four others were injured in separate Road accidents in Sikar and Dholpur on Sunday.According to police, five persons in a car were travelling from Haryana to Jaipur during early hours on Sunday.

heading: College-goer dies in crash on sister’s 2nd death anniv
sub-heading: A college girl, riding home on a scooter after Ganesh Visarjan, died after being rammed by a motorcycle in Piplani, Bhopal, on Friday evening. In a tragic coincidence, her elder sister had died in a Road accident on the same date exactly two years ago.

heading: Thane: Kin of cook killed in 2019 awarded Rs 19 lakh by tribunal
sub-heading: The Thane Motor Accident Claims Tribunal (MACT) recently awarded a compensation of Rs 19.68 lakh to the kin of a 24-year-old cook following his death in a 2019 Road accident.

heading: Chennai: IT firm employee among two killed in two accidents
sub-heading: Two bikers, including an IT employee, were killed in different Road accidents in Velachery and Chromepet on Thursday night.

heading: 33% rise in fatal accidents in Pune this year as against 2019
sub-heading: The roads in the city, including highways passing through it, recorded 309 accident-related fatalities this year so far, registering a rise of 33% as compared to 206 such casualties in the pre-pandemic year of 2019, data available with the Pune traffic police has revealed.

heading: 7 years into crash in Hyderabad, Ramya's kin in the dark over relief to accused
sub-heading: Police on Sunday not only booked engineering student Pranav, who was allegedly driving under the influence of alcohol, but also his friend and co-passenger for the accident on Road Number 3, Banjara Hills, in which two pedestrians died, after he crashed a car into them.

heading: Noida, Ghaziabad hospitals treat 70 for burn injuries on Diwali
sub-heading: Noida reported as many as 50 burn patients on Diwali, and Ghaziabad nearly 20, but no severe burn case. However, a private hospital in Kaushambi received a 55-year-old woman with 70% burn injuries and later referred her to another hospital.

heading: Two killed as lorry hits bikes
sub-heading: Two persons were killed in a Road accident at Bucchirajupalem on Wednesday when a lorry hit their motorbikes. The deceased were a car driver P Murali Krishna and a railway employee K Venkata Krishna Mohan. They died on the spot.

heading: ‘Make patients with spinal cord injuries independent’
