sub-heading: Ganga Spine Injury Rehabilitation Centre in the district has come out with a short film titled ‘Rise after Paralysis’ to spread awareness about the need for proper rehabilitation of people with spinal cord injuries.

heading: 60% fatal crashes in Bengaluru caused by 21-40 year-olds
sub-heading: People falling in the 21-40 age group contributed to around 60% of the fatal Road accidents reported in the city in the past three years, according to a study conducted by city traffic police.

heading: Vijayawada: 2 killed, 2 injured as car hits culvert wall in Krishna district
sub-heading: Two persons were killed in a Road accident on the national highway near Ampapuram village in Krishna district’s Bapulapadu mandal on Wednesday. A car heading from Vijayanagaram for overturned and hit a culvert wall.

heading: 4 factory workers killed, 8 critically injured in road mishap in Odisha
sub-heading: At least four workers of a private steel and power plant were killed and eight others sustained critical injuries in a Road accident in Odisha's Jharsuguda town on Friday, police said.

heading: UP: Eight killed as bus collides with truck in Lakhimpur Kheri
sub-heading: Eight people were killed and over 25 others sustained injuries after a bus collided with a truck in Uttar Pradesh's Lakhimpur Kheri on Wednesday morning, reported news agency ANI.

heading: 2 die, 10 injured as car rams into parked truck without tail lights
NRI doctor’s wife, two daughters killed in US car crash, Telugus shell-shocked
sub-heading: Three women of Telugu origin died in a Road accident in the US on Monday night. Police officials identified the dead as Vanisri Yelamanchili, wife of Dr Kodali Nagendra Srinivas, board director of the prominent Telugu Association of North America (TANA), and his two daughters.

heading: Maharashtra: Collector Rajesh Deshmukh orders correction of 44 accident-prone black spots in district
sub-heading: Collector Rajesh Deshmukh has said the authorities responsible for roads should take corrective measures at the 44 black spots identified on state and national highways in the district to put a check on accidents.

heading: Uttar Pradesh: 17 hurt in Yamuna expressway bus crash
sub-heading: At least 17 bus passengers were injured, five of them seriously, in a Road accident on Yamuna Expressway near milestone 133 in Mathura's Baldeo area on Thursday.

heading: Tamil Nadu: 5 receive organs of brain-dead man, 33
sub-heading: A 33-year-old brain-dead man from Karur gave a new lease of life to five patients in Trichy and other districts through Mahatma Gandhi memorial government hospital (MGMGH) on Friday.

heading: Car hits parked lorry, three dead
sub-heading: Three persons, including two children, died in a Road accident after the car they were travelling in hit a parked lorry on Tuesday in Vikarabad district. It is alleged that the lorry driver had not turned the parking lights on when the accident took place.

heading: Manipur accident: 10 killed, 35 injured as school bus overturns in Noney
sub-heading: At least nine girl students and a woman teacher were killed and 35 others injured, one of them critically, when the bus carrying them overturned in Longsai area in Manipur’s Noney district on Wednesday morning.

heading: 2 minors among 4 bikers killed in hit-&-runs
sub-heading: Four people died in separate Road accidents reported in the city at Bilkhiria, Berasia, Chhola and Nazirabad police stations during the past 24 hours. Two minors were knocked down by an unidentified speeding dumper on Monday evening.

heading: Fog kills again in Noida: Man dies, 28 injured as bus rams truck that braked on Yamuna Expressway
sub-heading: A passenger died and 28 others were injured when a private bus crashed into a truck that had braked suddenly on the Yamuna Expressway early on Tuesday.

heading: Picnic turns tragic: One dead, six injured as car overturns in Abhanpur
sub-heading: A picnic with the friends turned tragic when one of the six died while the two were severely injured and the other three friends of Bhilai camp survived injuries.

heading: Don't go fast, buckle up every single time: Delhi Police's advisory after Cyrus Mistry's car crash
sub-heading: "Don't go fast. Fasten your seat belt. Doesn't matter where you are sitting, front seats or back seats. Wear seat belts. Buckle up every single time!" Delhi Police tweeted with the hashtag Road Safety and Delhi Police Cares.

heading: Andhra Pradesh: Two charred to death in accident in Kanchikacharla
sub-heading: In a fatal Road accident, two trucks collided head-on in Kanchikacharla of NTR district on Wednesday. While two were burnt alive, one was severely injured in the incident. The deceased were identified as P Srinivas Rao (42) and B Ranga Rao (38).

heading: Rising accident deaths: Odisha govt to start audit of road signages soon
sub-heading: Alarmed by the rising fatalities owing to Road accidents, the transport department has decided to start an audit of road signages across the state. In the first phase, the audit will be carried out on at least 3,000-km stretch of roads.

heading: Jharkhand: 31 injured in bus-truck collision in Lohardaga
sub-heading: Around 31 persons, mostly bus passengers, sustained injuries in a Road accident near Reliance petrol pump on Chandra-Kuru road of the stretch of National Highway-75 under Kuru police station area of Lohardaga on Sunday.

heading: Kolkata: Three injured in two bike accidents
sub-heading: Three persons were injured in two separate Road accidents in Kolkata late on Saturday night. On the Bondel Road flyover Datla Ramesh (27) and the pillion rider Ramesh Raia (45) suffered multiple injuries when their motorcycle skidded off the road and lost control.

heading: 4 killed, 3 injured in accident
sub-heading: Four people were killed on the spot and three others seriously injured in a Road accident near Mopidevi in Krishna district on Thursday.

heading: 12 dead, 18 hurt in Poonch accident
sub-heading: As many as 12 people died while 18 others were injured after the minibus they were travelling in fell into a gorge at Sawjian Nallah in J&K’s Poonch district on Wednesday morning. Among the deceased were two minor boys, aged five and 14, as well as three women, two of them teenagers. “The accident took place near Barari Ballah Sawjian around 8.35am when the bus driver lost control of the vehicle near a bridge. The bus skidded off the road and fell into a deep gorge,” said an official.

heading: Poonch accident: One more injured succumbs, death toll of Sawjian road tragedy rises to 12
sub-heading: "Today at about 0830 hours, one Mini Bus (JK12-1419) on its way from Galli Maidan towards Poonch rolled down near Brari Nallah in the jurisdiction of PS Mandi resulting in death of 11 persons and over a score were injured," police said.

heading: Pilibhit: Four dead in separate incidents
sub-heading: As many as four people, including an examinee of the preliminary eligibility test (PET) of the Uttar Pradesh subordinate service selection commission, died here in separate incidents in the last two days. Out of four, three were killed in train and s, while a woman was found hanging in her husband's house. The police have sent the four bodies for autopsy and are waiting for the written complaints in all four cases for lodging the FIRs.

heading: Youth dies 6 days after bike crash
sub-heading: A 27-year-old bike-borne youth, who sustained multiple injuries in a Road accident in Sukhi Sewania locality on June 1, succumbed to his injuries while undergoing treatment on Monday. His friend, who was riding with him, had died four days ago.

heading: Trichy: Two including 2-year-old killed in accident; girl, 3, in critical state
sub-heading: A 40-year-old man and a 2-year-old boy were killed in a Road accident while a 3-year-old girl sustained grievous injuries after a car rammed against the motorcycle in which the victims were riding near Manapparai in Trichy. Police registered a case and further inquiries were on.

heading: Telangana: Three killed in Medchal accident
sub-heading: Three persons, including a couple, died in a Road accident at Medchal on Monday morning. All three died on the spot.

heading: 3 devotees die in accident in Rajasthan
sub-heading: Three devotees returning after a darshan of Baba Ramdeo in Ramdevra in Jaisalmer died in a Road accident while eight others were injured on Friday. The incident happened 2km ahead of Dechu when two speeding cars collided with each other.

heading: Overloaded vehicles, rash driving leading to accidents
sub-heading: May 21 will go down in the history of Dharwad as a Black Saturday. The district witnessed one of its worst accidents killing nine persons and injuring 12 others. The reason for this horrifying Road accident is said to be overloading of passengers, rash, negligent and drunken driving.

heading: Navi Mumbai: Two cops return Rs 4 lakh found in accident victims' scooter
sub-heading: Two beat marshal constables, Manohar Patil and Kishor Kardile, were felicitated for their honesty on Tuesday after they secured Rs 4 lakh belonging to a couple who died in a Road accident and deposited it at the police station. The money was handed over to the victims' son after the felicitation.

heading: Assam: Eight passengers injured as bus turns turtle in Sivasagar
sub-heading: Eight passengers of a bus en route to Tinsukia from Guwahati were injured after the vehicle turned turtle in Sivasagar district early on Tuesday. The incident took place near the Gammon bridge over the Dikhow river on NH-37 at Nazira in Sivasagar district.

heading: Chhattisgarh: Man visiting ailing father killed in accident on Janjgir-Champa road
sub-heading: A man was killed in a Road accident after a speeding truck collided with his two-wheeler near Akaltara in Janjgir-Champa road on Sunday around 11 in the morning.

heading: 10 dead, over 25 injured in several incidents of accidents in Tamil Nadu
sub-heading: It was a day of sad Road accidents in Tamil Nadu which continues to top the charts in the court in road fatalities. 10 people died and more than 25 people injured in several incidents in district stretching from the western belt to central and southern parts of the state.

heading: 28 intersections, 9 midblocks accident-prone spots: Study
Kanpur accident: Pall of gloom descends on Kortha village
sub-heading: A pall of gloom descended in Kortha village, when dead bodies of 26 villagers, who were killed in a Road accident on the highway in Ghatampur area of Kanpur on Saturday night, arrived from the postmortem house in the early hours of Sunday.

heading: Guntur: Three of family killed in accident
sub-heading: Three people of the same family were killed in a Road accident near Auto Nagar in Guntur district on Thursday night.

heading: ‘Scary... shocking...’: CM vows action on accidents
Unknown man dies in accident at Hayathnagar
sub-heading: A 37-year-old unknown man died in a Road accident at Hayathnagar on Sunday night. According to the police, locals alerted them about the fatal accident at Thorrur Cross roads near Sai Baba Temple. A patrolling team rushed to the spot and found the unknown man lying dead on the road.

heading: Road crashes rise by 10% in 2021, over 400 died in accidents in Gurugram
sub-heading: As the traffic volume on the city roads increased in 2021 due to the easing of mobility restrictions and offices beginning to call back employees, Road accidents saw a jump of around 10% year-on-year.

heading: 3 die in accidents on Bengaluru-Hyderabad highway
sub-heading: A day after a college student was killed in a Road accident near Chikkaballapur, two more died on Saturday on the same stretch on Bengaluru-Hyderabad highway.

heading: Kedarnath chopper crash: Birthday girl, cousin, friend meet tragic end
Three of family killed in accident
sub-heading: Three people of the same family were killed in a Road accident near Auto Nagar in Guntur district on Thursday night. The deceased were identified as Gopi Krishna (34), Sirisha (29), and Sneha Drhuthi (5) of Vijayawada.

heading: Ludhiana: 2 killed, 1 injured in accidents
sub-heading: Two persons died while one suffered injuries in two separate Road accidents on Wednesday morning.

heading: West Bengal: Mom, dad kill selves 2 months after daughter's accident death
sub-heading: Depressed over their daughter's demise in a Road accident on June 2, her parents too took their own lives.

heading: Samastipur agricultural varsity vandalised after Rajasthan student dies in accident
sub-heading: The students of Dr Rajendra Prasad Central Agricultural University (RPCAU) at Pusa in Samastipur went on the rampage in protest against the death of a BTech student in Road accident Saturday night.

heading: NHAI to submit report on accident-prone Sendri Junction
sub-heading: National Highway Authority of India (NHAI) will submit its report on Sendri Junction, the accident-prone junction on the four-lane National Highway between Gharghoda and Kunkuri in Bilaspur, to the Chhattisgarh High Court when the court will conduct its next hearing on suo moto public

heading: 10 killed, 23 hurt as bus, truck collide on Sinnar-Shirdi highway in Maharashtra
sub-heading: Ten people, including four women and four children, were killed and 23 others were injured in a head-on collision between a luxury bus and a truck on the Sinnar-Shirdi highway (NH-160) at 6.30am on Friday.

heading: 13 Amarnath Yatra pilgrims injured in twin bus accidents
sub-heading: The accident took place on the national highway near Nussu Badergund in Qazigund, they said.

heading: Cop among 2 killed in accidents
sub-heading: A police constable and an unidentified man were killed in two Road accidents in Trichy rural on Friday. The deceased has been identified as S Thangavel, 58, of Madhurapuri in Thuraiyur Taluk in Trichy district. He was working as a head constable at the Jambunathapuram police station.

heading: Madras high court confirms relief awarded to accident victim’s kin
sub-heading: The Madras high court has dismissed an appeal preferred by the state transport corporation challenging an order of the motor accident claims tribunal which awarded compensation to the family members of a man who died in an accident involving a government bus with an ambulance in Karur

heading: 4 returning from wedding killed in road mishap on Yamuna Expressway
sub-heading: Four people, including a nine-year-old girl, were killed and four others severely injured in a Road accident on the Yamuna Expressway in Mathura district late on Friday evening. The injured included a newly-wed couple who were on their way back to Mathura after tying the knot in Delhi.

heading: Maharashtra: Another female leopard knocked dead on NH-7
sub-heading: Another young female leopard was knocked dead on the Madhya Pradesh side of Pench Tiger Reserve (PTR) near the Khawasa border on Thursday afternoon on the widened NH-44 (NH-7). This is the second such incident in the last 20 days.

heading: Kedarnath helicopter crash: 2 Bhavnagar cousins, friend among victims
sub-heading: Three women - two cousin sisters and their friend - were among the seven victims of the crash. Kruti Barad, her first cousin Urvi Barad and friend Purva Ramanuj from Sihore town had started their spiritual sojourn from Ahmedabad on October 15. It was Kruti's birthday and she had even made a video call to her family to take blessings of Kedarnath.

heading: Noida: Woman (45) killed as truck hits bike, driver arrested
sub-heading: Two people died, while one received injuries in three separate Road accidents in Gautam Budh Nagar from 10.30 pm on Sunday to 8am on Monday, the police informed. A truck mowed down a motorcycle, killing a 45-year-old woman in the Tilpata area of Surajpur police station on Monday morning.

heading: Woman and son killed in accident
sub-heading: A mother-son duo was killed in a Road accident at Dundur Cross in Gadag district on Monday night.The deceased are Abhishek Basappa Sangannavar, 23, and his mother Iravva Basappa Sangannavar, 43, residents of Navalur in Dharwad.

heading: Leopard dies in accident on Nashik-Trimbakeshwar road
sub-heading: Officials from the Nashik West forest department informed that a four-year-old male leopard was killed after being hit by a speeding vehicle on the busy Nashik-Trimbakehwar Road late on Wednesday.The incident took place near Belgaondagha village located on the outskirts of Nashik city.

heading: Survey: 7 in 10 kids in ICUs have traumatic brain injuries
sub-heading: At least 7 out of 10 children with critical injuries admitted to paediatric emergency units have traumatic brain injuries, a quarter of them with severe grade injuries, according to the interim results of an ongoing study in Chennai and Bengaluru.

heading: Man dies in APSRTC bus and lorry collision
sub-heading: One person died in a Road accident after a speeding APSRTC bus collided with a lorry in Krishna district on Wednesday morning. The deceased was identified as Veda Suryanarayana Murthy of Nuzividu.

heading: UP saw 21,156 traffic accident deaths in 2020, highest in country, says NCRB report
8 killed, 3 hurt as jeep rams into truck in Uttar Pradesh’s Siddharthnagar
sub-heading: At least eight persons were killed, and three others injured when a jeep carrying them rammed into a stationary truck on National Highway-28 in Siddharthnagar district on Sunday morning.

heading: Haryana: 3 MBBS students burn to death in car after accident
sub-heading: Three MBBS students got burnt alive in a Road accident on Wednesday night in Sonipat after their hatchback car collided with a cement barricade and caught fire. Three others in car also sustained burn injuries.

heading: Mumbai: Devendra Fadnavis orders detailed probe into accident
sub-heading: Deputy chief minister Devendra Fadnavis on Sunday ordered a detailed investigation into the accident which resulted in the death of former Tata Sons chairman Cyrus Mistry. "Shocked and deeply pained to know about the demise in an unfortunate accident near Palghar. Spoke to DGP and instructed for detailed investigations," Fadnavis tweeted.

heading: Districts told to use reflective tapes to prevent accidents
2 die, 3 injured after car hits lorry
sub-heading: Two persons were killed while three others suffered injuries in a Road accident in which their car hit a stationary lorry near Seetharamapuram village under Payakaraopeta mandal in Visakhapatnam district on Tuesday. The deceased are H Chaitanya and K Jagadeesh.

heading: UT notifies 10-member district road safety panel to check accidents
sub-heading: On the directions of the Supreme Court committee on road safety, the UT administrator has notified the district road safety committee under the chairmanship of the district magistrate.

heading: Area near Corlim rly bridge tops accident-prone list with 11 deaths
Two die in accident in Vizag district
sub-heading: Two persons were killed in a Road accident when their bike hit a divider and the duo were thrown off and run over by a lorry near Regupalem Junction in Vizag district on Sunday. The deceased were K Maheswara Rao (38), a native of Veeraghattam, and S Ramesh (23) of Govada, Chodavaram.

heading: AP: Four of same family killed in road mishap near Madanapalli-Punganur road
sub-heading: Four members belonging to the same family including two children were killed in a Road accident near Moravapalli village in Madanapalli mandal of Annamayya district.

heading: 2 bikers killed in hit-&-runs in Bilkhiria, Berasia
sub-heading: A 50-year-old bike-borne man died after a speeding unidentified vehicle knocked him down in Bilkhiria locality on Sunday late night.

heading: 2 killed in Indore accidents
sub-heading: Two persons were killed in two Road accidents that took place on Monday night, the police said. In one of the accidents, a 30-year-old man was killed after being hit by a heavy vehicle in Betma area on Monday night.

heading: Eight dead, 24 injured in bus-truck collision in Hubballi
sub-heading: At least eight people were killed and 24 injured in a Road accident at Tarihal bypass here on Tuesday wee hours. The mishap occurred when a lorry loaded with rice collided with a private bus travelling from Kolhapur to Bengaluru.

heading: Himachal Pradesh: 5 killed 2 injured in Chamba accident
sub-heading: Five people were killed while two sustained injuries after a jeep which they were travelling in rolled down into a gorge near Satrundi on Chamba-Killar road in Himachal’s Chamba district on Sunday afternoon.

heading: 2 elderly men killed in hit-and-run in Nashik
sub-heading: Two elderly men were killed in a Road accident in the Adgaon area of Nashik on Thursday night after the scooter they were riding on was hit by a truck.

heading: Mysuru: Students injured after bus footboard gives in
sub-heading: Nanjangud villagers on Saturday staged a flash protest blocking a road after a girl student was seriously injured when the footboard of a KSRTC bus gave in. Some others have also been injured in the incident.

heading: Uttar Pradesh: 6 killed as SUV hits divider in Azamgarh
sub-heading: At least six people were killed when an SUV collided with a road divider after hitting a biker in Bhagwanpur area under the limits of Bardah police station in Azamgarh. The SUV was heading to Vindhyachal in Mirzapur on Saturday night when its driver lost control over wheels. The injured biker was rushed to a hospital in Thekma area, where he died during the course of treatment.

heading: Tirupati: One killed, four hurt in accident
sub-heading: BN Kandriga SI Jagannadh Reddy told reporters that the impact of the accident was so severe that the car went under the back wheel of the cement bricks-laden tractor on the Tada- Srikalahasti road around 4.30 am.

heading: Raj ranks ninth in accidents, fourth in fatalities: Report
sub-heading: Rajasthan is among the top 10 states that recorded the highest number of accidents in the country in 2020 despite a decline in number of Road accidents in 2020.

heading: Cattle-spurred accident: Widow to get 34L
sub-heading: A civil court has ordered the Vadodara Municipal Corporation (VMC), state government and police department to pay a compensation of Rs 34 lakh to a woman, whose husband who died in a Road accident due to a stray cow in Vadodara, in 2014.

heading: 2 trucks catch fire following accident near Jodhpur, 3 die
sub-heading: Three persons were charred to death in a fatal Road accident in Shergarh near Jodhpur when two trucks caught fire after a head-on collision on Monday night. The fire was triggered due to blast of the fuel tank of one of the trucks.

heading: Two killed in separate road mishaps in city
sub-heading: Two people were killed in Road accidents in different parts of the city. Sector 38 resident Surya (24) was killed after his car rammed into a roadside tree near Kishangarh on Thursday. Police said he was travelling at a high speed.

heading: 14 workers injured in accident
sub-heading: Fourteen women daily wage workers were injured in a Road accident near Parnasala village close to Gudur on the Machilipatnam-Vijayawada highway. The women, all from Gilakaladindi near Machilipatnam, were travelling in an auto when it was hit by a speeding car from behind.

heading: Cyrus crash probe points out bad road geometry
sub-heading: A probe into the Road accident that killed ex-Tata Sons chairman Cyrus Mistry has revealed that the car he was in crashed due to speeding beyond the 40kmph limit on that stretch and probable overtaking from the left. It was conducted by the NGO Save Life Foundation into the accident on Surya river bridge near Charoti village in Palghar district.

heading: Bengaluru: JD(S) worker dies in hit-and-run accident
sub-heading: A 25-year-old JD(S) worker died in a Road accident in the early hours of Saturday after attending the party’s valedictory programme — Janata Jaladhare — held at Nelamangala on Friday.Kurur police have identified the deceased as Mousin, an auto driver and resident of Hassan town.

heading: Child dies in accident
sub-heading: A child was killed in a Road accident at Jubilee Hills Road No. 45 on Thursday night. An SUV was involved in the accident. On the vehicle a sticker with ‘MLA’ written on it was pasted. Following the accident, police rushed to the spot to begin investigating the case.

heading: Nashik top cop writes to NHAI to prevent highway accidents
sub-heading: The Nashik city police have expressed concern over the rising number of accidents and deaths occurring on the national highways passing through the city.

heading: Two die, 2 injured in separate accidents in Uttar Pradesh
sub-heading: Two persons died while two others were injured in two separate Road accidents that occurred on Sunday night in Pilibhit. In one of the accidents, a Maruti Eeco car and a truck collided on Pilibhit-Basti NH 731.

heading: Telangana: Congress leader Feroz Khan's step daughter dies in car crash
sub-heading: Congress leader Feroz Khan's stepdaughter died in a Road accident after the car in which she was travelling rammed into the median and flipped at Shamshabad in the early hours of Monday. The accident occurred when the 21-year-old victim, Tanya Kakde, along with two of her friends was travelling in the car from the RGI Airport to the city.

heading: Mumbai: Sea link mishap accused blames stationary vehicles and toll staff

heading: Father & son killed as speeding lorry hits car in Maharashtra
sub-heading: A man and his teenaged son were killed in a Road accident along the Islampur-Ashta road in Sangli district on Tuesday evening.

sub-heading: The population of stray dogs is rising every day in Madurai city, as is the number of accidents on poorly-lit roads when night falls.

sub-heading: Four, including a seven-month-old baby boy, died and several others were injured in separate rain-related incidents in Uttar Pradesh's Bareilly division.

sub-heading: Hyderabad: A 13-year-old-boy was killed and his father suffered injuries in a Road accident when their bike was hit by a lorry on the ghat road near Lambasingi under Chintapalle Mandal in Vizag Agency. tnn

heading: Electric bus driver held in connection with Kanpur mishap
sub-heading: The police on late Sunday night arrested the electric bus driver after six people died and nine were seriously injured in a midnight accident at the Tatmil crossing in Kanpur.

sub-heading: The jeep (Bolero) collided with the truck at Gudamalani Ram Ji ki Gol mega highway in the district.

heading: 19-yr-old, woman killed in accidents

sub-heading: At least three Road accidents were reported near Chandapura on NH-44 (Bengaluru-Hosur Road) in the last 10 days.On Wednesday morning, there were traffic jams along the stretch after yet another accident.

sub-heading: At least three Road accidents were reported near Chandapura on NH-44 (Bengaluru-Hosur Road) in the last 10 days. On Wednesday morning, there were traffic jams along the stretch after yet another accident. Residents and regular commuters blamed South Western Railway for frequent accidents near the rail underbridge and said their pleas to widen it have fallen on deaf years.

sub-heading: A confectionery trader was killed in a Road accident reported late on Saturday night, police said.

sub-heading: Condoling the death, chief minister Yogi Adityanath directed the local administration to provide proper treatment to the injured.

heading: Cops train vendors, dhaba owners to respond in cases of accidents

sub-heading: At least three inter-state ganja smugglers were killed in a Road accident when their car hit an under-construction culvert and overturned near Shikarganj Junction under Dattirajeru Mandal in Vizianagaram district on Friday midnight. heading: Driver held for fatal accident

heading: ‘Ensure interim relief to accident victims & kin’
Kerala: Chilling video of car-scooter crash in Malappuram surfaces

sub-heading: Two persons were killed and two other injured in a Road accident involving three trucks near Modasa town of Aravalli district on Saturday morning.

heading: Nature of roads responsible for one-third of accidents in Goa, says Centre

Data from the Union ministry of road transport and highways (MoRTH) shows that the citizens’ apprehensions are not misplaced.

sub-heading: Soniawan panchayat ward member Ramjit Paswan, 26, allegedly died in a Road accident near Dehri bridge late Saturday evening, the police said. He belonged to Ichipur village under Patna’s Dulhin Bazar block.

heading: 18 more accident-prone spots in Nagpur in 2021

sub-heading: Two persons were killed, while four others were injured in different Road accidents that took place between Sunday night and Monday morning, the police said.

Police registered a case against the errant bus driver and are searching for him.

heading: Road safety experts visit Kalinga Ghat bus accident site

heading: Road safety experts visit Kalinga Ghat accident site
sub-heading: A day after the Road accident near Kalinga Ghat on NH no. 157 in Ganjam district in which six persons from West Bangal died and 40 were injured, a road safety experts on Thursday visited the accident site to ascertain the exact cause of frequent accidents in the 10 km ghat road.

heading: Five pilgrims from West Bengal among 6 killed in accident in Tehri Garhwal

According to district authorities, the vehicle first hit the parapet wall and then plunged into the gorge. Subsequently, it caught fire and all the six people on board are believed to have died on the spot.

heading: At 211, Kolkata recorded lowest accident deaths in 2021
sub-heading: The city witnessed 211 accidental deaths in 2021 out of which 87% of the victims were either travelling on foot or on two-wheelers, a report titled ‘Accidental Deaths and Suicides 2021’ released by the National Crime Records Bureau (NCRB) recently stated.

Police believe both accidents occurred due to drivers losing control of their vehicles. Notably, both incidents occurred at night, when driving is prohibited in the hills.

sub-heading: Nine persons were killed in a gory Road accident reported near Budagavi in Uravakonda mandal in Anantapur district of Andhra Pradesh on Sunday evening.

heading: 45-year-old killed in road mishap

heading: Madhya Pradesh: Five killed in head-on collision between loading auto rickshaw and mini bus in Raisen
sub-heading: Five people including a 15-year-old girl were killed in a head-on collision between a loading auto rickshaw and a mini bus in Raisen district late on Wednesday.Four died on the spot. Six others sustained injuries.

heading: Nine men killed in two separate accidents in Krishnagiri, Tirupur
sub-heading: Nine people were killed in a little more than 24 hours in Krishnagiri and Tirupur districts in two different Road accidents In Krishnagiri, four pedestrians succumbed to their injuries after a speeding car knocked them down at Ankinayanapalli near Bargur on Friday evening, when they were returning home after having tea.

heading: Organs harvested from brain dead man gives new lease of life to five people in TN
Telangana: Four dead in bike crash in Suryapet district
sub-heading: According to police, the deceased were B Aravind (20) of Thettekunta Thanda, D Anand (21) of Lakshminaik Thanda, B Naveen (21) of Bhotya Thanda and V Vinesh (19) of Epur Thanda of in Suryapet district.

heading: Telangana: 4 killed, 2 hurt as car runs over pavement in Karimnagar
sub-heading: Four people were killed and two sustained injuries after a SUV driver lost control over his vehicle and rammed into huts on a pavement in Karimnagar on Sunday morning.

heading: iRAD system to record accidents launched
sub-heading: Gujarat CM Bhupendra Patel on Gujarat Day launched iRAD (Integrated Road accident Database) system, following the suggestions from the Union road ministry. The system will be implemented by four departments: police (home), transport, roads and buildings, and health.

heading: Auto trolley driver held for drunk driving accident
sub-heading: An auto trolley driver G Srinivas was arrested on Friday for culpable homicide by Medchal police for causing a fatal Road accident while driving the vehicle under the influence of alcohol.

heading: 4 men, old woman killed in accidents
sub-heading: As many as five persons were killed in Road accidents in different parts of the city on Thursday and Friday amid Holi festivities. The accidents took place on Lohia Path, in Indiranagar, Vikasnagar, Chinhat and Banthara.

heading: Cop among three killed in accident
sub-heading: Three individuals including a 31-year-old police constable were killed and two others were injured in a Road accident near Chalamatti Cross off Anchatageri village in Hubballi taluk on Tuesday night.

heading: Banswara SHO dies in accident on Kota highway
sub-heading: In a Road accident on Chittorgarh-Kota highway, the SHO of Banswara Sadar police station lost his life after the car in which he was travelling overturned near Kherpura on Sunday. The deceased, identified as Ramesh Chandra Meena, was returning from Jaipur after attending a training programme. The driver lost control of the car and the vehicle fell from the bridge near Kherpura. He was taken out from the car by police personnel of the Parsoli police station.

heading: City records highest road mishap deaths in 2021
sub-heading: As many as 1,446 people have died in 2,656 Road accidents, in four districts of Prayagraj range, in the year 2021.

heading: Four killed as car crashes into tree
Meerut: 4 killed after speeding car rams into bike
sub-heading: Two people on a motorbike died in a Road accident after being hit by a speeding car on Meerut-Baghpat highway on Sunday.

heading: Gurugram: 6-member team to avert accidents on foggy days
sub-heading: The traffic police constituted a fast fog action support team (F-FAST) on Sunday to prevent Road accidents on low visibility days.

heading: 4 killed in separate accidents in Trichy
sub-heading: Four people were killed in separate Road accidents in Trichy district here on Tuesday. In the first incident, two died on the spot when a two-wheeler in which the victims were riding rammed against a truck on Trichy-Karur highway.

heading: 4 killed in Himachal Pradesh road mishaps
sub-heading: Four persons were killed in two different Road accidents in Himachal Pradesh on Wednesday. While three were killed in Sirmaur district after their vehicle fell into a gorge, one person died in Kinnaur after a boulder fell on his car.

heading: Kin donate organs of brain-dead man
sub-heading: A donor’s heart, which was retrieved from a 51-year-old Astapuram Mallaiah, who was declared as brain dead by Yashoda hospital was transported to Nizam Institute of Medical Sciences (NIMS) in a green channel with the help of traffic police and transplanted to a recipient immediately.

heading: 3 dead as car falls into pit in Nagarkurnool
sub-heading: Three persons died in a Road accident in Nagarkurnool district in the wee hours of Friday. Nagarkurnool police said that the accident took place after the car fell into a huge pit that was along a culvert. The car hit the railing of the culvert before falling into the pit.

heading: 14-year-old biker dies after speeding truck hits him, two injured
sub-heading: Two people died in two separate Road accidents in the city on Saturday. In the first incident, a 14-year-old bike-borne boy died while his two relatives escaped with injuries after a speeding unidentified truck hit their motorcycle on Friday.

heading: Telangana: 8 killed as lorry, van collide head-on in Kamareddy district
sub-heading: In a major Road accident on Sunday evening, eight people, including six women, died and 17 others were injured in a head-on collision between a rice-laden lorry and a minivan at Hasanpally in Kamareddy district of Telangana.

heading: Centre urges Odisha to adopt Tamil Nadu model to reduce accident deaths
sub-heading: Wary of an alarming rise in Road accident deaths in Odisha, the Centre has urged chief minister Naveen Patnaik to consider adopting a road safety model of Tamil Nadu that has succeeded in reducing accident fatalities by 54% in the last five years.

heading: Jammu and Kashmir: 11 killed in road mishap in Doda; PM Modi expresses grief
sub-heading: A mini-bus fell into a gorge in Doda district of Jammu and Kashmir on Thursday killing eleven people and injuring fifteen others of which seven were airlifted to Govt Medical College and Hospital (GMC&H) Jammu for specialised treatment.

heading: Bhopal: 2 bikers sans helmet killed in accidents
sub-heading: Two men, who were riding bikes without helmet, were killed in two separate Road accidents in the past 24 hours.

heading: Deaths by accidents in Odisha increase by 16% from last yr
Haryana minister's brother meet with accident; one dead, one injured in Kurukshetra
Road mishap deaths rose by 12% in 2021: CB data
sub-heading: Deaths due to Road accidents increased by 12% across the state from January-October in 2021 as against the corresponding 10 months in 2020.

heading: Telangana: Man dies in ‘drunk driving’ case, four others killed in separate road mishaps
sub-heading: Though police claimed that the New Year celebrations passed off without any fatal Road accidents, five persons died in separate Road accidents between Friday evening and Saturday morning. One of these cases was allegedly in connection to drunk driving.

heading: Rush injured mishap victims to hospital & get reward of Rs 5,000
Youth dies in bike accident
Man killed by speeding car at Kallambalam
sub-heading: A 72-year-old man was killed in a Road accident that occurred at 5:45 pm at Kallambalam here on Sunday. Gopinathan Ashari P of Puthuvalvila Puthanveedu, son of Paramu Ashari, was the deceased. He is a resident of Idamannila in Navaikulam Panchayat.

heading: Maharashtra: Three arrested for killing tiger, wild boar in Umred
sub-heading: Eight days after a tiger and a wild boar were poached in Makardhokda in North Umred, the forest officials have arrested three persons involved in the case. The poaching case was initially dubbed as a Road accident case.

heading: Pedestrian & motorcyclist killed in separate accidents; police probe on
sub-heading: A pedestrian and a motorcyclist were killed in separate Road accidents at Talegon Dabhade along the old Pune-Mumbai highway and at Solu village on the Markal Alandi Road on Tuesday.

heading: 3 arrested for killing cousins in staged accident in Jodhpur, kingpin on run
sub-heading: Jodhpur police detained three persons for 'staging' a Road accident to murder two people, Ramesh and Kavita, in Jodhpur on Tuesday. The conspirators had planned to kill Ramesh, but his cousin Kavita, who with him, also fell victim to the accident. The accused had hit the duo, who were travelling on a bike, from behind with an SUV and made it look like an accident.

heading: HDFC manager, wife & 4-yr-old child dead in Agra-Lucknow e-way accident
UP man dies in Kota accident
sub-heading: A 25-year-old man from Uttar Pradesh was killed on the spot while two others of his family members sustained injuries in a Road accident on Kota-Udaipur mega highway near Khadipur village in Kota early on Tuesday morning.

heading: 4 killed, 4 injured after pick-up van rams into container truck
sub-heading: Four people were killed and four others injured after a Pick-up vehicle in which they were travelling rammed into a container truck in Derapur area of Kanpur Dehat late Tuesday night.Three died on the spot while one succumbed to injuries in a hospital in Kanpur.

heading: Accident victim gives new life to seven people
Brain-dead teacher gives fresh lease of life to five patients
sub-heading: Venkatesh, a mathematics teacher at a high school in Somwarpet taluk in Kodagu, has given a new lease of life to five patients, after his family members agreed to donate his organs.

heading: Bike accident kills 3 in Andhra Pradesh's Guntur district
sub-heading: Three youths died in a Road accident at Krishnayapalem village of Mangalagiri mandal in Guntur district on Saturday. According to the police, the accident occurred when the youths, who were triple riding on a motorcycle, dashed against an electricty pole after losing balance. It is suspected that the youths were drunk.

heading: Court: Future prospects must be considered while calculating accident relief
sub-heading: Observing that future prospects should be taken into account while calculating compensation in Road accident cases if injury results in significant loss of earning capacity of claimants, the Madras high court has enhanced the compensation from 83.9 lakh to 92.

heading: Bundi cops honour man for helping road mishap victim
sub-heading: To motivate public to help those injured in Road accidents reach hospitals in time, the Bundi district police on Monday felicitated Sanjay Bairagi, a resident of Jajawar village with a certificate of appreciation.

heading: Two youths killed in accident
sub-heading: Two youngsters were killed in separate Road accidents in Wani and Satana over Sunday and Monday. A 23-year-old youth was killed in Vani after being knocked down by a luxury bus, while in Satana, an 18-year-old youth was killed after being hit by an unidentified motorist.

heading: Punjab: Official on election duty dies in accident
sub-heading: Punjab chief electoral officer (CEO) S Karuna Raju on Sunday condoled the demise of Vijay Bhaskar Sharma, assistant director of youth services, Barnala, who died in a Road accident while returning from election duty on Saturday evening.

heading: Noida traffic cops kick off survey to mark new accident-prone spots
sub-heading: The Noida traffic police has embarked on a survey to identify new black spots where frequent accidents have been reported in the past three years. In 2019, the cops identified 35 black spots and fixed a majority of them.

heading: Jammu & Kashmir: 5 killed, 12 injured as tempo traveller hits car, falls into gorge in Ramban
sub-heading: At least five persons were killed while 12 others sustained injuries after a tempo traveller rolled down into a deep gorge following a collision with an Alto car near Kela Morh on Jammu-Srinagar National Highway in Ramban district late on Thursday night.

heading: Woman killed, hubby & son hurt as lorry hits bike
On Noida e-way, roads leading to it, 8 accident-prone spots: Survey
sub-heading: The Noida traffic police has identified as many as 15 vulnerable stretches under the jurisdiction of just two of its several police stations - Noida Expressway (8) and Sector 24 (7) - where frequent accidents have been reported in the past three years. Of the eight accident spots in the Expressway police station area, three are on the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway itself, while the other five are on internal roads.

heading: Seven of Noida family dead in UP expressway crash
sub-heading: Seven members of a Noida-based family were killed and two others critically injured in an accident on the Yamuna expressway on Saturday morning. Their car, a Maruti Wagon R, was hit by an unidentified vehicle near milestone 68 in Mathura’s Naujheel area around 4 am.

heading: Four killed as mini truck collides with truck in Bilaspur
sub-heading: Four youth died in a Road accident after an over-speeding truck collided with a mini truck at Takhatpur area in Bilaspur while a sand-laden truck run over youth on national highway 30.

heading: Rajasthan saw over 15,000 accidents between January-August this year
sub-heading: Rajasthan has recorded over 15,000 Road accidents between January and August on the Integrated Road accident Database (IRAD), which has been developed by Indian Institute of Technology-Madras (IITM) and implemented by the National Informatics Centre.

heading: Tamil Nadu accident victims to get free care in 609 government and private hospitals
sub-heading: The scheme – Nammai Kaakkum 48 (saving our lives in 48 hours) — announced on Thursday will be offered to all Road accident victims for a year. It will be dovetailed with the Chief Minister’s Health Insurance Scheme next year after review.

heading: HC asks insurer to pay school ₹6.2L towards accident liability
sub-heading: A school saddled with the liability in a Road accident involving its bus will have to be compensated by the insurer, the Kalaburagi bench of the high court has said.

heading: Prayagraj records 94 road mishap deaths in Jan and Feb
Head constable killed in accident
Tamil Nadu: Head constable killed in accident
sub-heading: A 47-year-old head constable attached to the Peelamedu police station was killed in a Road accident on Saturday night.The deceased was identified as R Ganesan, a resident of Kalapatti.

heading: Sanitation worker killed as vehicles collide in Dewas
sub-heading: Two persons, including a woman sanitation worker, died in Road accidents in BNP police station area in Dewas district in the last 24 hours, police said.

heading: Odisha: Traffic calming measures fail to check accident deaths at junctions
sub-heading: The state government has expressed concern over an alarming rate of accident deaths at road junctions — the feeder roads connecting state and national highways — despite the adoption of traffic calming measures at those places by different road owning authorities.

heading: Uttar Pradesh: Five of a family, driver die in Barabanki crash
sub-heading: Five members of a family and a driver were killed in a Road accident in Barabanki on Wednesday morning. The accident occurred near Narayanpur in Ramsanehighat Kotwali area on the Ayodhya-Lucknow highway.

heading: United in grief, accident victims’ kin recall Kidderpore killer stretch horror
sub-heading: Sana Khan (37) is struggling to continue English-medium education for her two children, aged 8 and 5 years, and is planning to change their schools after her husband, Aslam Khan, died in an accident on a cratered Hide Road earlier this month.

heading: Madras HC upholds 24 lakh compensation to kin of accident victim
sub-heading: Dismissing a petition moved by an insurance company, Madras high court has upheld the compensation awarded to the family members of a man who was killed in a Road accident in Dindigul district on October 20, 2018.

heading: 4 killed in 3 separate accidents in Nashik city
sub-heading: Four people were killed in three separate Road accidents in Nashik city on Sunday. A 41-year-old biker was killed when he was knocked down by an unidentified truck driver near the Mirchi hotel, within the jurisdiction of the Adgaon police station, at 6 pm.

heading: Two die, 2 injured in three accidents in Greater Noida
sub-heading: Two people died while two others were injured in separate Road accidents in Greater Noida, officials said on Wednesday.

heading: Woman, her son die as car crashes into tractor on Eastern Peripheral Expressway
sub-heading: A 57-year-old woman and her son died after the car they were travelling in crashed into a tractor that was being driven on the wrong side on the Eastern Peripheral Expressway (EPE) near Dankaur on Tuesday afternoon.

heading: JHALSA to lend legal aid to Pakur accident victims
sub-heading: Jharkhand State Legal Service Authority (JHALSA) will provide legal aid to the victims of the Road accident that killed 16 people and left 30 injured when a bus hit a truck in dense fog at Karmdiha village in Pakur district on Wednesday.

heading: Assam: Five members of Bihu team killed as vehicle turns turtle
sub-heading: At least five members of a Bihu team, including four teenagers, have been killed and five others injured as a vehicle carrying them turned turtle in Assam's Biswanath district, police said on Sunday.

heading: 30-year-old dies in accident, kin donate organs
18-year-old dies in accident but heals terminally ill patient
sub-heading: A team from PGIMER went to Dr Rajendra Prasad Government Medical College, Tanda, retrieved the kidneys of an 18-year- old accident victim, Vishal and transplanted it into a terminally ill renal failure patient who was a matching recipient at PGIMER.

heading: 6 die in collision in Rajasthan's Sirohi, 10 more killed in other accidents
sub-heading: Chief minister Ashok Gehlot offered condolences to the bereaved family members of the deceased and wished for speedy recovery of the injured.

heading: Uttarakhand: 5 killed, 3 injured after utility vehicle falls into gorge in Tehri Garhwal District
sub-heading: Five people were killed and three others injured after a pickup vehicle they were travelling in veered off the road and fell into a deep gorge on Ghansali-Ghuttu road in Tehri Garhwal district on Thursday.

heading: Rajasthan: RTI activist killed in accident, family alleges foul play
sub-heading: In September 2019, the 27-year-old RTI activist had raised his voice against corruption in developmental work being carried out in Titarwasa gram panchayat, which was adopted by Vice President Venkaiah Naidu under the MP model village scheme in May 2017.

heading: 3 killed, 6 hurt in accident on Agra-Lucknow expressway
sub-heading: Three persons, including a six-month-old infant, were killed while six others were injured in a Road accident on Agra-Lucknow Expressway in Nasirpura village under the limits of Bangarmau Kotwali police area of Unnao district on Wednesday night.

heading: Three killed as car rams into bike and auto
Karnataka native killed after car plunges into pit
Rajasthan: SUV overturns and falls into trench in Dungarpur, 4 dead
sub-heading: In a tragic Road accident on Udaipur-Ahmedabad highway (NH-48), four persons were killed when the SUV in which they were travelling overturned after skidding on the wet road and fell into a 30-feet deep trench in Dungarpur. Three persons died on the spot, while one person succumbed to injuries in the hospital.

heading: Telangana minister KTR's timely help saves two injured youths
sub-heading: Telangana Minister K Taraka Rama Rao (KTR) has helped two Road accident victims by shifting them to hospital in his convoy vehicle on Monday night at Siddipet. The visuals of the incident went viral on social media.

heading: Kalyan: Corporator’s son injured in mishap due to poor road work
sub-heading: The unfinished patchwork in the middle of the under-construction six-lane Kalyan-Shilphata led to three Road accidents at the same place within a few minutes in which Shiv Sena corporator Mallesh Shetty’s son Harmesh Shetty was injured after Mercedes he was driving overturned.

heading: HC directs Centre to act on relief to wife of Qatar accident victim
34% less crashes this year on Bhopal roads, but fatality rate doubles
sub-heading: : The casualty rate in Road accidents has spiked considerably this year despite 71 days of total lockdown. Casualty figures in Road accidents had touched around 200 till October this year despite a marked decline of almost 34 per cent in the number of s, compared to last year.

heading: Trader’s son killed in Supaul dist, SIT formed to crack case
Student on way to college killed in accident
sub-heading: A 19-year-old college student died on Wednesday after he met with a Road accident on national highway near 18th Mile near Korani under Attingal police station limits.

heading: Man who travelled on mini truck killed after accident
sub-heading: The dangerous journey of people on open mini trucks continues unabated even though it poses threat to the lives of passengers. The latest victim was a 25-year-old man who lost his life after a mini truck he was travelling met with a at Konalai in Trichy on Sunday.

heading: Three including a couple killed in separate accidents
sub-heading: Three persons died in two different Road accidents on Monday. In the first incident a CA who was riding an electric vehicle was hit by an autorickshaw in Kapodra area. Such was the impact that the autorickshaw too turned turtle after causing the accident.

heading: 22 injured as tractor overturns in Vizianagaram district
sub-heading: At least 22 people were injured in a Road accident in the wee hours of Friday near Chamalavalasa-Rachakindam villages under Bondapalli mandal in Visakhapatnam district when the tractor-trailer they were travelling in turned turtle.

heading: Zero accident in Assam with NYE check on drunk driving
sub-heading: The New Year’s eve in Assam passed off without a single road mishap as a result of a clampdown on drunk driving by the police, district administrations, transport and excise departments across the state.

heading: 2 Sabarimala pilgrims die in car crash
sub-heading: Two pilgrims returning from Sabarimala died and another person was injured after their car rammed a stationary truck on Mount-Poonamallee Road in the wee hours of Tuesday.

heading: 22-yr-old cheats death by skin of teeth in Navsari accident
sub-heading: In the tragic Road accident that killed five members of a family on Kasbapar to Dhola Pipla road in Navsari on Monday, a sixth member had a miraculous escape from the jaws of death.

heading: In death, 39-year-old gifts life to 3, vision to 2; kin decide to honour engr’s wish who died in accident
sub-heading: In his death, Pradeeep Vishwakarma has given life to three persons and gifted vision to another two. The 39-year-old electrical engineer, a resident of Eldeco-II, got critically injured in a Road accident near Dubagga on Friday night after a nilgai rammed into his two-wheeler.

heading: Youth killed in Bengaluru pothole accident, 5th death in 7 months
sub-heading: A 27-year-old man was killed after his two-wheeler ran into a pothole created by BWSSB work on Subhash Chandra Bose Road at Muneshwara Layout near Vidyaranyapura, north Bengaluru, on Sunday night.

heading: Appreciate citizens who help accident victims: Parab
sub-heading: State transport minister Anil Parab on Sunday said the transport department was continuously working towards road safety in a bid to bring down the number of Road accidents and expressed appreciation for citizens who rush to help accident victims.

heading: Scooterist hit by car, dies; 2 more killed in Eintkhedi
sub-heading: A speeding car hit a scooter-borne 40-year-old man killing him in Eintkhedi on Friday. The deceased Dinesh Ahirwar was returning home from a marriage function when the incident took place. He sustained severe injuries and was rushed to hospital where doctors declared him brought dead.

heading: Odisha government wakes up to joint inspection of accident spots
sub-heading: The Supreme Court committee on road safety had ordered all states to conduct joint inspection of accident spots by motor vehicle inspectors, police personnel and road engineers. However, its compliance seems to be lacking in Odisha, as is evident in a letter sent by state commerce and transport secretary Madhu Sudan Padhi.

heading: Activists urge caution as accidents back to pre-Covid levels in Tamil Nadu
sub-heading: As lockdown norms are gradually relaxed, more vehicles are back on roads, and not unexpectedly, this has led to an increase in accidents on highways.

heading: Rd mishap: Bankers had stepped out post lunch
sub-heading: Two bankers— Nitesh Kumar Mandal (43), AGM, Reserve Bank of India, and Sujay Kumar Vishwas (35), assistant vice-president, SBI Capital—and a car driver, Asif Shaikh, were seriously injured in the Road accident outside the World Trade Center on Tuesday.

heading: Mumbai: 1 dead, 3 injured as drunk driver loses control of car near World Trade Center at Cuffe Parade
sub-heading: Two bankers- Nitesh Kumar Mandal (43), AGM, Reserve Bank of India, and Sujay Kumar Vishwas (35), assistant vice-president, SBI Capital-and a car driver, Asif Shaikh, were seriously injured in the Road accident outside the World Trade Center on Tuesday. They were taken to Bombay Hospital.

heading: Cluster buses killed 76 people in 3 years in Delhi
sub-heading: Last week’s accident involving an unruly cluster bus driver, who rammed into seven vehicles in North East district’s Shastri Park and left at least nine people severely injured, has put the spotlight back on the menace involving these buses in the city.

heading: Golden hour treatment plan for accident victims
Noida: Bus rams Eeco from behind in Dadri, woman & daughter die, six injured
sub-heading: A 45-year-old woman and her 17-year-old daughter died while six other members of their family were injured — two of them critically — after a roadways bus rammed into their car in the Dadri area on Monday morning.

heading: Stretch to be developed as mishap-free road
sub-heading: The state transport and road safety minister on Tuesday announced that as a pilot project the Jaipur-Kishangarh stretch on NH8 would be developed as a model accident free road after a recent audit revealed it to be highly vulnerable to accidents.

heading: Four killed in car-truck collision in Aravalli
sub-heading: Four persons were killed and one injured in a Road accident on the highway near Rahiyol village in Danasura Taluka of Aravali district on Thursday morning.

heading: Alwar girl was not raped, but hurt in mishap, say cops
sub-heading: Four months after a 15-year-old deaf and mute girl was found with critical injuries including her private part, Alwar police on Sunday concluded the case and stated that injuries were caused in a Road accident and she was not raped. Police had booked the driver of the bus and a bike rider in bailable offences and even kept their arrests and bail under the wraps.

heading: 4 of a family killed in a road mishap in Anantapur
sub-heading: Four members of a family were killed in a Road accident in Anantapur district late on Saturday evening. A five-year-old girl, identified as Jasmiya Bhanu, had a miraculous escape.

heading: Bengaluru saw most accidents caused by overspeeding last year: NCRB
sub-heading: Bengaluru reported most overspeeding-related accidents among 89 major cities across the country last year, according to a National Crime Records Bureau (NCRB) 2020 report released last week.

heading: Van stops suddenly as tyre bursts, bike crashes into it, 2 children die
sub-heading: Two brothers — aged seven and 10 months — died in a tragic accident on Wednesday as the bike they were on crashed into an Eeco van that had lurched and come to a sudden halt in the middle of the road because of a flat tyre.

heading: 37 injured, vehicles damaged in Himachal Pradesh accidents
sub-heading: Around 37 people were injured and over a dozen vehicles were involved in different Road accidents in Himachal Pradesh on Saturday. Some 32 people were injured in a bus accident in Solan district and five were injured in a car accident in Una district. At Kandaghat in Solan district, over a dozen vehicles were damaged after a speeding truck rammed them from rear.

heading: Maharashtra: Kalyan cop killed in 'suspected' hit-and-run on Mahape bridge
sub-heading: In a 'suspected' hit-and-run incident on Mahape bridge along Mahape-Shilphata road, a 45-year-old assistant police inspector, attached to Kolsewadi police station, was killed allegedly after being hit by an unidentified vehicle, while returning home on his bike, at around 12.15am on Wednesday. Some motorists stopped a passing ambulance, in which he was rushed to NMMC hospital in Vashi, where he was declared brought dead, informed API Ganesh Shinde of Turbhe MIDC police station.

heading: Cops to follow Centre plan on crash causes
sub-heading: Traffic police said on Monday they will implement a central government initiative to keep a database of accidents that will help them assess the reasons for crashes and work on necessary interventions in Gurgaon.

heading: Misrod most accident-prone in Bhopal, Habibganj next
Greater Noida: Out for Eid shopping, youth dies, four friends injured after car falls into canal
sub-heading: A 19-year-old man died and four of his friends were injured after the car they were travelling in fell into a canal in Dadri area of Greater Noida early on Monday. Preliminary investigation suggests the driver of the car may have fallen asleep behind the wheel.

heading: Jammu and Kashmir: 4-year-old among 26 injured after bus turns turtle in Udhampur
sub-heading: Meanwhile, two persons were killed in Jammu when a rashly driven mini bus plunged into River Tawi late Friday night when driver of vehicle lost control over the vehicle.

heading: 5 killed, 13 injured in Udaipur mishap
sub-heading: In a Road accident on Wednesday late evening, five people, including three children, died and 13 persons were seriously injured when a loading vehicle skidded off the road on a turn and rolled down into a gorge near Nandeshma under Nai police station in Udaipur.

heading: Kolkata: Court cancels bail for driver accused in fatal accident
sub-heading: For the second time in three weeks, the fatal squad of traffic police has managed to approach a city court and cancel the bail of a driver involved in a fatal accident where the accused was charged with culpable homicide not amounting to murder.

heading: Missing constable from Vizag found dead in Vizianagaram district
sub-heading: A 38-year-old police constable, who went missing a week ago, was found dead on Saturday under suspicious circumstances near the ITDA Park at Thotapalle under Garugubilli mandal in Vizianagaram district.

heading: 4 killed in separate road mishaps in Rajasthan
sub-heading: Four persons were killed and two others injured in two separate Road accidents in Bharatpur and Viratnagar since Thursday evening.

heading: Andhra Pradesh: Task force staff, cab drivers first to reach accident spot
sub-heading: Minutes after the Road accident on Bhakrapet ghat road near Tirupati that claimed nine lives and left 44 injured, red sanders anti smuggling task force personnel who were undertaking combing operations inside the nearby Seshachalam forests were at the accident spot to rescue survivors.

heading: CM meets kin of truck accident victim, assures them of support
Kochi: Karnataka youth to get hands of brain dead man
sub-heading: A young man from Karnataka is set to get the hands of a 51-year-old brain dead man from Kollam at a private hospital in Kochi.Donor Vinod died while he was undergoing treatment following a Road accident at Government Medical College Hospital, Thiruvananthapuram.

heading: Chennai: Vehicles damaged as 30-year-old tree falls in Pondy Bazaar, none injured
sub-heading: Days after a tree in front of the Secretariat fell and claimed the life of a woman police head constable, a three-decade-old tree fell on parked vehicles behind the Pondy Bazaar police station in the wee hours of Saturday, damaging them. No one was injured in the accident.

heading: Three, including two brothers, killed as bike rams into lorry
Jharkhand: Family donates eyes of teenager killed in accident
sub-heading: The family of a teenager who died in a Road accident on Sunday donated his eyes, hours after he died. Saurav Raj (16), a student of Class X, was admitted to a hospital after the scooter he was driving hit a road divider on Kanke road on Sunday morning.

heading: Andhra Pradesh: Four killed as SUV rams auto in Anantapur
sub-heading: Four persons, including two children, were killed in a Road accident near Pulakunta village under Gummagatta mandal in Anantapur district on Monday. This is the second major Road accident in the Rayalaseema districts in two days after seven persons lost their lives in a gory road crash near Tirupati in Chittoor district on Sunday.

heading: Cops identify Diamond Harbour Road, Bypass as most accident-prone stretches
sub-heading: Diamond Harbour Road and EM Bypass have emerged as the most accident-prone roads in Kolkata.

heading: Punjab: PRTC bus crashes into 4 schoolgirls, 1 dies in Sangrur

sub-heading: On the night of December 1, 2021, a youth driving his father’s car under the influence of alcohol ploughed into a group of seven women sitting by a roadside near Talaghattapura, killing three of them.

heading: In-principle nod to amend vehicle accident claim rules

sub-heading: More than three out of five fatal accidents and road-accident injuries in Bengal happen on the state’s highways, according to a report prepared by the ministry of road transport and highways.

heading: Punjab raises road safety bar, sets up taskforce to control accidents
sub-heading: In probably the first of its kind initiative in the country, the Punjab government has institutionalised road safety by designating a chief engineer at the state level and executive engineers in all the 22 districts. These officials will ensure road safety, which till now was without any accountability.

heading: Teacher dies in accident, injured son gives consent for organ donation
sub-heading: A retired teacher, who died due to severe injuries in a Road accident, on Monday provided a new lease of life to three patients and vision to two.

heading: Official on Covid-19 duty dies in accident

sub-heading: Only 27 residents availed the corporation’s accident insurance cover in the past one year, triggering posers on the popularity of the scheme.

heading: Maximum accidents reported near Khopoli on old Mumbai-Pune highway
sub-heading: Traffic moving towards Mumbai from Pune on the old Mumbai-Pune Highway (NH-48) saw a higher number of fatal Road accidents near two points — Panvel city and Khopoli — in 2020, revealed a study by the NGO SaveLIFE Foundation, in collaboration with the Maharashtra State Road Development Corporation (MSRDC) and the Maharashtra highway police.

heading: Surat: Organs of two brain-dead friends give new lease of life to several patients
sub-heading: As many as 13 organs and tissues were donated to give new lease of life to many patients in cadaver donation after two friends died in Road accident and their family decided to donate their vital organs.

heading: Flyover accident: Driver to be chargesheeted

sub-heading: Haryana recorded 26.71% less cases of Road accidents during the first-half of 2020 compared to the corresponding period last year, with the daily count of such cases coming down to 22 this year from 30 in 2019. Similarly, fatalities from s declined by 26.

heading: Hyderabad man killed in US accident

sub-heading: A suspected Road accident death turned out to be a case of suicide after police analysed CCTV camera footage.

heading: Five, including woman, kid, charred to death as car catches fire after collision in Etah

heading: Family of youth killed in Jaipur accident refuses to take body
sub-heading: The family of the deceased police constable aspirant who was killed in a Road accident on Friday refused to take the victim’s body till their demands were met. The family is asking for monetary compensation and the body is still at SMS hospital. The youth was killed after a speeding luxury car hit him on Sodala elevated road.

heading: Two dead, four injured in accident near Pudukottai

heading: Over-speeding killed 5K in 2019

sub-heading: Gujarat witnessed a drop of 3.3% in accidental deaths in 2019 as compared to the previous year. The drop comes after a meagre increase of 0.7% in 2018.

heading: Maharashtra: Road crashes high even with curbs, laments CM Uddhav Thackeray
sub-heading: CM Uddhav Thackeray on Tuesday said that despite Covid-19 travel restrictions, road crashes in the state did not come down drastically in 2020 and fatalities were almost as high as in 2019.

heading: Prayagraj: Scribe found dead, kin claim murder by liquor mafia he had exposed

As the incident took place a day after the victim had expressed apprehensions of being attacked by the liquor mafia, police registered a case of murder in connection with the death on the complaint of his wife.

heading: UP: Scribe found dead, his family claims murder by liquor mafia he had exposed
sub-heading: Initially, the case was being treated as that of an accident after some eye-witnesses told the police that they saw journalist Sulabh Srivastava’s motorcycle hit a roadside pole late on Sunday night and then rammed into the hand pump before the victim hit the ground. He was rushed to hospital where he passed away.

heading: Four of family killed in mishap

heading: Nagpur: Pench tiger ‘Mystery Male’ injured in hit-and-run on NH7
sub-heading: The tiger is suspected to have been hit by a speeding vehicle either in the night or during the wee hours while crossing the NH7. The incident came to light around 10.15am when a family, which was on its way to Nagpur from Narsinghpur to treat its son, had stopped close to the guide wall near Paoni to attend nature’s call.

heading: NGO:Liquor vends on Panchkula roads key reason behind surge in accidents

This was the second major accident within 24 hours and only 12km from the spot where 5 people had died in an autorickshaw-truck collision on the NH-31 on Monday. The accident took place on Kataria-Kosi bridge near Kursela on NH-31.

heading: Gujarat: Cop never misses covering dead with shrouds
sub-heading: Three years ago, he came across a horrible sight of a woman lying in a pool of blood after the car she was travelling in met with an accident near Tarsali flyover.

heading: City animal lovers offer a healing touch to stray dogs injured in accidents

According to the data released by the Union ministry of road transport and highways, overspeeding caused 72 per cent of the reported accidents. AP was eighth in the country when it came to accidents due to overspeeding.

heading: 2 Oggu Katha artistes die in road mishap

heading: Prayagraj records 441 road mishap deaths between January 1 and November 15 this year

sub-heading: Citing police records that peg the total count of over-speeding cases, registered between January and September this year, at a staggering 34,150, cops say that it is fast becoming the primary cause for fatal Road accidents in the city. As investigation continues in the two major accidents reported over the last few days, data shows that over 120 fatal s in Hyderabad were caused due to over-speeding, during the first nine months of 2019. Another 12 were caused by drunk drivers.

heading: Two found dead on SPR, probe launched

heading: 7 die in 2 separate accidents in Begusarai and Muzaffarpur districts

heading: Kanpur gang rape case: Father of accused booked for killing survivor's father

heading: Hyderabad: Team to study all aspects to minimise accidents on Outer Ring Road

heading: 7 killed, several injured in road mishaps in Ranchi, Dhanbad

In order to provide timely medical help and increase the chances of survival of victims, the authorities are planning to bring it down to 10-12 minutes.

heading: Nashik: Man beats wife to death, tries to pass it off as accident

heading: UP: One dead, many injured in four e-way accidents
sub-heading: The accidents occurred on Agra-Lucknow expressway, Yamuna expressway and NH-2

heading: Blood spills on city roads: 45 fatal accidents in Jan alone

sub-heading: Death of a near and dear one in a Road accident might well be the end for him or her, but a beginning of ordeals for the family. As several of the victims are often primary breadwinners of the family, the ripple effects are often felt for a long time.

heading: Balloon dilation done on accident victim
